text: Good case, but can be a bit tricky to slide in at times. Not really a case, but more rather a shell for the phone. Offers some protection to the sides, but the top and bottom are exposed leaving the edges susceptible to damage if it is ever dropped. The fit was good, the holster/stand works just fine. It doesn't add too much bulk to the phone. The clip is also lightweight. Offers 360 degree swivel on the clip so it can be worn any way. The stand also works well for propping up the phone. Overall, not a bad case, just lacking a bit on the protection side. It's a thin case/shell, so it's not going to offer too much in the way of drop protection here.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Real nice speed rope.  This is a great rope for workouts.  Lightweight, but very well made and durable rope.  Great for cardio workouts.  Great adjustability on the length of the rope for different sized users.  My wife has used it and even with shortening it, it still works great.  No problems with it.  Nicely designed and well made rope.  Great workout book with it.  The handles are great.  Very smooth when jumping rope with it.  Fast and tangle free use.  This is a fantastic workout tool.  Has to be one of the best speed ropes I've ever used.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

Good case, but can be a bit tricky to slide in at times. Not really a case, but more rather a shell for the phone. Offers some protection to the sides, but the top and bottom are exposed leaving the edges susceptible to damage if it is ever dropped. The fit was good, the holster/stand works just fine. Doesn't add too much bulk to the phone. The clip is also lightweight. Offers 360 degree swivel on the clip so it can be worn any way. The stand also works well for propping up the phone. Overall, not a bad case, just lacking a bit on the protection side. It's a thin case/shell, so it's not going to offer too much in the way of drop protection here.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Very good glass screen protector for the Note 5.  Fit was really good, the cutouts were right where they needed to be.  Easy to install after prepping the phone.  Once installed the touch sensitivity is the same as the phone itself without this glass on it.  Nice to have some extra added protection on your screens just in case.  This also works with pretty much any case out there on the market.  I wouldn't recommend using one with an existing plastic screen protector built it, it can cause issues.  I took the one off of my case and just use the glass now.  Doesn't affect the case at all.  Still works great.  No issues.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Good case, but can be a bit tricky to slide in at times.  Not really a case, but more rather a shell for the phone.  Offers some protection to the sides, but the top and bottom are exposed leaving the edges susceptible to damage if it is ever dropped.  The fit was good, the holster/stand works just fine.  Wife likes it because it doesn't add too much bulk to the phone.  The clip is also lightweight.  Offers 360 degree swivel on the clip so it can be worn any way.  The stand also works well for propping up the phone.  Overall, not a bad case, just lacking a bit on the protection side.  It's a thin case/shell, so it's not going to offer too much in the way of drop protection here.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Fit is spot on with these glass screen protectors.  Cutouts are exactly where they should and need to be.  Covers the glass perfectly.  Very easy and simple to install after prepping the phones glass.  Once it's line up properly and laid down, there are absolutely no air bubbles at all.  Smooth and responsive just like the phone itself.  Touch is just as if you were touching the phone.  No lag, very responsive, works just fine.  Nice to have a spare also in case the first one ever gets damage at any point.  Great screen protector for your phone.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Nice case for the Note 4.  Fit and finish are really good for the price.  Easy to install and fits the phone great.  It seems like it should offer a good amount of protection from drops and bumps.  I have had it installed for a little while and now so far it seems to be holding up quite well.  I sometimes drop my phone on occasion and so far this has held up well enough for me.  No cracked screens or phone damage.  The case has taken the majority of the scuffs and dings, yet the phone is still in pristine condition.  I do like the multi layered design to this case with the outer cover, screen protector, rubber shell and backing.  I am not overly rough on my phones, but sometimes I have dropped it from the seat of my truck and it has hit concrete/pavement and the case has done its job 100%.  No damage to the phone at all.  May have to invest in a few of these.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

This is a nice sized mat.  It was larger than I had expected it to be and was quite happy with it.  Simple to use and easy to clean up.  No more litter tracks from the litter box.  The mat works great at grabbing it off our cats feet and keeping it there.  It may not grab all of it, but it does a great job of grabbing majority of it.  Material is nice, mat feels to be durable and heavy duty.  Very pleased and happy with it.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Very nice 3 set of cutting boards for your kitchen.  These work well.  We have used them with fruits, vegetables, cheese, bread, etc.  They all work and have worked great.  Lightweight, but still durable.  Very easy to clean.  After a quick rinse, they go right into the dishwasher.  They take up no space in a drawer or cabinet.  My toddler son likes to cut up his bananas for a snack so my wife has taught him how to properly use a cutting board.  With a plastic butter knife of course.  He enjoys helping around the kitchen.  These are safe and very family friendly cutting boards.  Wife loves them and uses them quite often throughout the week for meals.  Great set.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

This is a decent, belt, but the bottles that come with it are a tad bit smaller than I like.  I ended up taking them out and just using it to carry my own refillable water bottle.  The design and overall construction of the belt is nice.  Seems like it should hold up quite well to extensive use.  Good material and good stitching.  The pouches hold bottles well even if you use your own or anything store bought.  They will stay secured.  The front pouch is almost large enough for a tablet.  It will easily hold phones, cash, keys, etc. with not problems.  Belt is comfortable to wear for extended periods of time.  I wore it for roughly 6-8 hours straight while at an amusement park.  Only thing I really had to do was occasionally adjust it.  It didn't bother me in any way what so ever.  It works well.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

THESE LITTLE LIGHTS ARE BRIGHT!!  Holy jeez...these will definitely light up a decent area to see.  Small and compact, but yet they do throw a good amount of light.  Also, they are solid feeling light.  Makes a great accessory light, bumper/brush guard light or back up light.  These are just ridiculous for as small as they are.  Very impressive.  I added these to my F250 as an extra set of fog/running lights and they perform really well.  I could run these at night and not need headlights.  Very happy and very impressed with them.  Just have to see how well they put up with the elements here.  Seem solid enough, hopefully they last thru the rain and heat.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Great cable for the price.  I tested this cable with an iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPad Mini 2 and newest iPad air.  All recognized the cable and charged fine.  The cable is about 10ft in length so that is more than enough adequate length to plug it in and use it while it is charging and to give you plenty of room to move around and not be restricted by the cable itself.  Both ends of the cable are made nicely and looking sleek.  They look like they would hold up better than the standard OEM cable that came with both phones and tablets.  Build quality is nice, cable is thick enough to take some wear and usage and where it connects to both plugs is nice and stout.  Over all this is a really nice cable for charging multiple devices if need be.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Wife isn't into wearing expensive jewlery too often.  Mainly only her wedding rings and some other things she wears on occasion.  She does like to wear jewelry, but mainly, inexpensive stuff.  That way she really doesn't freak out if it breaks or she loses it.  This necklace fits that bill nicely.  It is nicely designed and made.  The chain on it is a tad bit thin, but for the size of it, that is to be expected I guess.  She really likes it and has worn it quite a few times since getting it.  Very nice looking and goes with basically everything.  She's happy, I am happy.  That's all that matters.  It came nicely boxed and arrived quickly.I received this item at a discounted price for a review.

Very good odor neutralizer.  I wear boots all day at work and my feet take a beating and sweat.  I wear moisture wicking socks to keep my feet dry, but my boots are waterproof tac boots and they aren't so breathable.  They do sometimes remind me I've been wearing them all day when I take them off.  These odor neutralizers work great killing off odor from my boots.  I just toss these in after work and by morning they are nice and fresh.  Here in Florida your feet will sweat in the summer and these do a phenomenal job and doing away with boot odor.  Great for any type if shoe.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

I started taking this and found myself not craving things as much.  It has helped me suppress my appetite.  No jittery feeling or any odd affects from it at all.  I feel good after taking it.  Not like a physical rush or anything, just my mood is better altogether.  I don't feel like I need caffeine or anything sugary to keep me going.  I really like that.  I was a caffeineaholic.  I needed it, craved it.  This really helped fight that craving and urge.  I have lost a few pounds from using it so far.  I find myself not wanting to eat as big of portion as before.  I still eat regularly, but I eat smaller portions more often.  I have more energy now I think because of that.  I would need a Monster or Rockstar or something by around 2pm, not anymore with the way I have changed things up a bit.I haven't really altered my lifestyle at all, minus the cutting back of the caffeine.  I must say it has helped me immensely.  I will continue to use this and continue my goal to lose more weight by the end of this year.  This stuff is helping me achieve that.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone.I received this product at a discounted price for a review

This little thing is awesome!!  It works with any USB that has power.  Laptops, desktops, phones via OTG cable, power banks, car and home phone chargers.  Anything that puts power to a USB will light this.  Even Xbox and Playstation USB will power it.  It is bright too.  Surprisingly bright for how small and compact it is.  I put this in my emergency bag with a 10,000mAH power bank so I have an emergency light if need be.  It's small, compact and nicely made.  Has a nice soft rubbery outer shell, kind of like a phone case.  Nicely designed and nicely made.  Did I mention its BRIGHT!!  Very impressive little USB powered light.  I need a few more.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

This is a bright light.  It is also much whiter light than most bulbs.  I have these style white LED lights in my kitchen and I prefer them there to the traditional yellowish style bulbs.  Much better for cooking IMO.  I put this bulb in my breakfast bar can and it emits quite a bit of light.  Like some others have also stated, there is a slight delay after flipping the switch.  Not a big deal to me honestly.  Basically the same style and look as a traditional light bulb.  It is a bit heavier, but it shouldn't affect anything.  Nice light overall.  I like how much light it emits personally.I received this product at a discounted price for a review

These film type screen protectors are a bit tricky to install.  Good thing they offer 3 in the package.  I ruined 1 trying to install it at the get go.  I found out if you take a spray bottle with water and mist both the screen and the adhesive side of the film then apply it, they are much, much easier to install and to get all of the air bubbles out.  Once on and dried, it works great.  No touch issues and no issues with it sticking or finger not sliding around like it does on the glass.  The matte does help with the sun glare.  I am outside most of the day working and I was constantly having to look for shaded areas to use my phone for work.  With the matte it helps cut down on the sun glare.  Not 100%, but it does make the phone more usable in very sunny conditions.  I can actually use my phone in daylight with no issues now.  Decent screen protector.  Works fine after installed.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Nicely made auxiliary cable for connecting your audio devices.  Great quality cable.  Very well made.  Step down design works great in phones with or without cases.  This works with any device that has a 3.5mm jack.  Works nicely to extend any cable to give more room when needed.  The ends on this cable are beautiful.  They are made and designed really well.  Nice solid feel to them.  Not cheap plastic at all.  The cable itself is also of a very nice quality.  Durable yet still flexible enough to allow movement if need be.  Have used this cable with phones, tablets and bluetooth speakers and it works flawlessly with all of them.  This is a fantastic 6ft auxiliary cable.  Works great, no issues.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

This is a decent camera, but I think it's limited by a few things.  First off, the software for this is nice on the computer, but the mobile version is just way too limited on what it can do.  I really wish it was as in depth, function wise as the PC software is.  It can be a bit tricky to install and get up and running.  After it is up, it works OK.  I had a few issues with the initial set up.  I am running it off of an access point in my home and you physically have to hard-wire it first and make sure it reads the WiFi in your home well enough to connect.  I had to move it to the room where my main router was, then connect it, then move it to where my access point it and then reconnect it to my access points WiFi.  It didn't want to cooperate a few times and I had to do a hard reset on it and start fresh.  Can be a bit frustrating, but after it's connected, it has stayed connected with no issues.The camera itself is decent quality.  Nothing too fancy or extravagant really.  Just a basic Pan/Tilt/Zoom IP camera.  Solid feel to it, works great once it's install and up and running.  Controls like I said are limited on the mobile app, compared to the PC software.  The mobile app will recognize other cameras tho.  I have another type of this same IP camera running in the mobile app alongside this one.  The listen/speak feature is nice, but you have to turn each on individually to use it.  Can't speak and listen at the same time.  Kind of a bummer on that.  That would have made this really nice.Picture quality is decent.  It provides a nice picture in daylight and low light situations.  Infrared works really good at night.  Decent distance on it.  You do have the usual audible click at night when the infrared clicks on and off.  No biggie tho, not that loud.  Overall, nice camera just wish the mobile app was and had as much in depth control as the desktop software did.  Happy with it tho.  Works fine for keeping an eye on my home.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

This thing is very cool, but I wish it had the option to stay on one pattern indefinitely instead of cycling thru them all.  There were a couple patterns that I really liked and wish it could be set to stay on those instead of randomly going thru them all.  I like the remote and the various speeds it has for the light, but that one small thing it really is missing.  Nice solid feeling light, feels quite durable.  Not sure how weather resistant it is, but it seems like it would deal with light moisture without it being affected by it.  Not sure I would leave it out in a downpour, but I thing it would be OK if left out and it got a small bit of condensation on it.  The whole setup is really nice.  Came packaged really well and nice and neat.  After putting it together and trying it out, my neighbors were pretty impressed with it and how far it shined and how bright it was.  She was actually commenting how she was interested in purchasing one.  Great light minus that one small ability to keep the light on one pattern indefinitely.  Other than that, it's great and my son really loves it.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

This is a great backseat organizer.  My toddler son like to take everything with him when we leave the house and it usually ends up all over the backseat or the floor of the car.  Now we can store things for him in this organizer and they don't end up everywhere or get lost under the seats.  This also works well as a seat protector from his shoes kicking the back of the seat.  Tons of pockets in this organizer.  Has some nicely sized pockets throughout this.  It can easily hold quite a bit, from toys to tablets.  It has plenty of room for whatever they decided they need to take with them.  Made of a nice heavy, but not overly heavy material.  The straps on the top and bottom are easily adjustable for a variety of seat sizes.  It works in our car, mini van and pickup truck.  No problems adjusting it to any sized seat.  Easily clips and un-clips quickly to move from one vehicle to another.  Also, the included window shades were a nice bonus.  They clip on easily and work great.  Nice having them for more than one vehicle and being able to leave them up and not having to switch them out from car to car.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Very nice quality HDMI cables.  The cable itself is very small and easy to work with.  I work in the home theater field/industry and I come across many different HDMI cables from many different manufacturers.  These are solid and durable cables.  Seem to be well designed and nicely made.  Nice solid ends on these.  These inserted nicely and held in place very well.  Had no issues with hooking them up to an Onkyo receiver, Xbox One, PS4 and Samsung Blu-ray player.  Each device took to it with no problems.  Good gold plated ends on these cables.  Nice quality for an amazing price.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

Nice tempered glass screen protector.  Fit was spot on with this.  Both the top and bottom cutouts were precisely placed with no issues.  Install was super easy to do with the included prep items.  Once lined up and laid down on the phones screen, this left absolutely no air bubbles.  These tempered glass protectors are just so much better than the old film style ones that were such a nightmare to put on.  These go on easily and they stay on.  Even with aftermarket drop suit cases and bumper cases these aren't affected.  They work together great.  The touch response is still exactly as it was without the screen protector installed.  Really nice glass.  Works fantastic.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

Works great, but needs a little tweaking in the design.  The nose bridge is a bit annoying.  Needs a bit of padding or a redesign.  Also, there is no touch button for the screen like most VR headsets have.  Some way to use the phone without opening up the case each time.  A small cutout on the right side for a finger to get into to touch the screen is kind of needed.  The headset case itself is kind of thinly made.  Could be easily broken if not careful when using it.  The straps are good and fit good when adjusted correctly.  They can be a bit tricky to adjust tho.  Overall tho, really nice headset.  Fits most phones, even larger Note 4 sized phones.  But, only without a case.  I had to remove my Note 4 from its case to use it.  I do wish these headset makers would take into account phone cases when designing and making these.  My 3 year old absolutely loves this thing for the underwater fish and dinosaur apps.  He is truly amazed at it.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

This is a great fitting tempered glass screen protector for the Note 5.  All the cutouts were great.  Very easy to install once the phone has been cleaned and prepped for the glass.  The touch response is exactly as it was before the glass was applied.  No issues with that.  Well packaged product.  Doesn't add bulk to the phone at all.  Even with phone cases on it still works and fits great.  I am using an aftermarket drop suit case and it causes no issues at all.  Good product, works really well.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

I myself had an issue installing the software using Windows 10.  After a few failed attempts using the disc, I went to the D-Link site and pulled the latest drivers for Windows 10.  After installing the driver it worked and has worked flawlessly.  This is a great little AC Wireless Adapter.  I run a Asus AC68U wireless router and this has had no issues connecting or staying connected with either the 2.4GHz or 5Ghz channels.  It has a small footprint on the desk in my kitchen.  Takes up hardly any space.  You always know when you're connected with the blue ring around it.  When it's lit to a solid blue you're connected, when it's flashing, you are not.  Easy and simple way to know your wireless status.  Great little AC Adapter with fantastic wifi speeds and solid connectivity.  They've done a great job with this little device.  Very happy with it and I would recommend it.I received this product at a discounted price for review.

Great rapid charger, but this is not a Qualcomm fast charger.  This works well with pretty much any device that can be charged via USB.  Phones, tablets, power banks, bluetooth speakers and headsets, GoPro, etc.  It works well with all of them.  It has a 2.1A and 1.0A port so it can change a multitude of devices.  It is great with any device it charges.  But it is in no way a Qualcomm fast charger, so don't let this fool you into thinking it is.  It is not overly large and it fits into any 12v socket and stays put.  We use this in our rear 12v ports for our sons iPad in our van.  Works great there and he always has a place to charge his iPad mini while were out and about.  Good quality charger.  Nicely made and has a solid feel to it.  Not cheap looking or nor does it feel cheap like some.  Works really good.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

This works well but can be a bit tricky to get working properly.  We have a German Shepherd puppy who has become a barker for no reason.  This after getting it dialed in correctly has helped immensely with his barking.  He has shown quite the improvement after using this for a few weeks now.  I do wan't him to bark to alert me to door knocks and other outside noises, but not at anything inside the home unless I tell him to.  He is well trained for a young dog.  I did take him to a very good training school for dogs.  I want him to protect my home when I am there or away, but I do not want him barking at every little thing.  This has helped him learn what is acceptable and what is not.  So far this has been great and easy to work with.  Nicely designed and seems to be well made.  Not sure how water resistant or waterproof this collar is, haven't used it around water and I don't plan on it just for the collars sake.  Very pleased with the results so far.I received this at a discounted price for a review.

Good quality tempered glass screen protector for the iPhone 6.  Cutouts are spot on for the buttons and speaker.  Lined up just right.  No touch issues with this glass at all.  Phone responded just like I was touching the phone's glass.  No delay or unresponsive touches.  Very smooth and thin glass.  This works well for phones without or without cases.  I have it on while using an Otterbox case and have no issues with it.  I did removed the plastic film from the Otterbox case to use this screen protector.  Overall, nice glass, fit is great, touch is great.  No problems here.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

This is a great beard oil compared to some others I have used in the past.  Goes on great either when your beard is wet or dry.  I prefer to use it right after getting out of the shower.  Apply a decent amount and either work it in with your hands or you can use a beard comb or brush.  I just use my hands.  This does have a scent that may take a bit to get used to.  I was a little overwhelmed by it at first, but after a few uses it really doesn't bother me much.  Manufacturer may want to take that into consideration.  Some may not like it and be turned off by it.  It can surprise you with first use.  Other than that tho, it is nice quality beard oil.  I work around drywall and concrete blocks and my beard gets dried out and dust and debris in it most days.  After a good hot shower and washing my beard out I apply this and its nice and soft again.  I use it daily or ever other day for the most part.  Very happy with it.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

These have been great.  My son is a picky eater at 3 years old and he doesn't even know he's taking vitamins.  We mix these up into his mashed potatoes that he loves and he's good to go.  Very easy to use and very kid friendly.  Fantastic way to get your little ones the vitamins they need buy refuse to eat.  This is a great product for sure.I received this product at a discounted price for review.

These are string of lighted LED with globes.  I had a issue with a few of the clips, but the seller took care of the issue and replaced them for me.  The are a bit shorter than I expected in length, but I may buy another set to extend them at some point.  These worked great in our outdoor screened in porch.  They were easy to hang up and give off enough light to keep the area lit, but they are not overly bright.  More of just enough ambient light to keep it lit without being overbearing.  Great for sitting out at night when the weather is cool and having some not so bright lights on.These were a bit tricky to install the light clips into the globes.  Put the lights into the clip first, then install them into the globes from the side with the 2 little holes that hold them in place.  Then gently line them up and clip them in place.  They didn't have informative instructions on these, which they really need IMO.  They only will go in one way thru the end with the 2 holes.  After getting the replacement clips these were great.I received this item at a discounted price for a review.

Perfect replacement battery for my wife's Toshiba Satellite laptop.  She cooked her other battery by leaving it plugged in all the time when the battery was installed and just killed it.  This replacement battery works really well.  No issues with the laptop recognizing it and running off of it.  I did do a fresh install of Windows 7 after putting it into the laptop, and then upgraded to Windows 10.  Still recognizing it with Windows 10 Home x64.  Run time will vary like it says, depending on your power settings.  I have gotten around 4 hours of life out of it which is about what her OEM battery ran.  I run ours on balanced settings.  Very nice quality battery.  Nicely made and nicely designed compared to OEM.  Looks and feels identical to the Toshiba battery minus the printing on the bottom.  Very happy with it.I received this at a discounted price for a review.

Quick charge car charger.  Works just like the fast charge wall charger that came with my phone.  No issues at all with my Note 4 quick charging with it.  Recognizes it with no problems.  60% charge in 30 mins.  Can't really complain about that.  Good quality, feel and design to it.  Both USB ports provide fast charging for any device that will support it.  Nice blue LED light inside that lights up to let you know when you've connected it to the 12v socket.  Have been using it for some time now and it has worked great.  Phenomenal little dual USB port charger.Price is comparable to most chargers at those brick and mortar places that don't even offer quick charge capabilities.  Quick charging is quickly becoming the new norm with chargers.  My Note 4 came with a quick charger for the house, but having one in the car now is a great thing.  Nice to have around especially when both phones can use the quick charge at once.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

What can I say that hasn't already been said in the reviews.  This is a nicely sized bottle of Aloe Vera Gel.  Has a very nice feel to it and no weird odors that sometimes come with skin care products.  This is a must for any household.  So many beneficial uses for Aloe its crazy.  This came nicely packaged without the pump in the bottle to avoid leaks.  I am out in the sun all day for work so I use Aloe on my neck, arms and face quite often for sunburn.  This helps immensely with many ailments that pertain to skin.  Very nice feel and texture to it when applying it.  I have had no adverse reactions to it.  Very good product.I received this item at a discounted price for a review.

Love these quick charge chargers for the car.  This is my 3rd one and all of them have been phenomenal.  They work not only with those devices that allow quick charging, but they work great for devices that don't.  They will charge anything.  Bluetooth headsets and speakers, power banks, phones, tablets, GoPro cameras, you name it.  If it's USB capable charging, this will work.  Nicely made, and solid.  Not cheap feeling at all.  Also, it doesn't take up very much space in your 12v sockets.  No issues with this charger at all.  Also comes with a nicely made charge cable that is about 3ft in length.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

This is a great dual USB quick charger.  Works just as well as the fast wall charger than came with my Note 4.  60% charge in 30 mins just like the OEM wall chargers that came with my phone.  Works with all our other devices also that are not quick charge.  Besides the Note 4, it worked with a Tab S 10.5, Tab 3 8.0, Galaxy S4, iPad mini, GoPro, Bluetooth headset and USB power bank.  All worked just fine with no issues at all.  Very nice charger.Well made and seems well built.  Good solid wall charger that doesn't feel cheap in any way.  Not overly big, but I would recommend using it in the bottom socket, as it will cover the bottom socket if you use it in the top one.  Very good with all of our devices.  No issues with it at all.  Can't have too many of these lying around.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

This is a great fit for those who want a clear case.  Good fit, and good look.  Easy to install on the phone.  Took all of about 1 minute to get it on and set.  Clear hard plastic backing with a softer rubber outer surround for the phones edge.  Cool design on this.  Basically a naked case for your phone just to have extra protection on it.  Seems it will offer some drop protection with it on.  This has no screen protection at all, so I would recommend investing in a tempered glass screen protector too.  All the cutouts for the cameras and buttons are spot on.  They all work good with no issues or obstructions.  Works great, fits great and looks great.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Nice replacement cable for any 30pin Apple device.  We have a few older iPod's that still work with the 30pin cable, but all of the cables were either no good or wouldn't recognize the cable for some reason.  This one works with all of them now.  Not quite sure why our old ones quit, but this one has done the trick and brought them back to life for us.  My toddler son can now use my old iPod's for his car trips.  Nicely made cable, solid feel and build to it.  Kinda glad Apple went away from this design of cable, but hate having to pay ridiculous prices for OEM cables that are outdated.  This one is great for the price.  If you've got any old iPod's laying around that need a 30pin, this cable will hopefully help you like it has us.  Very happy with it.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

Very cool little carabiner style clip.  I tend to keep my keys hooked to my belt loops when I am just out and about.  This I normally just use a basic climbing carabiner for that.  This works better IMO because I can just unhook either the larger or smaller locking ring depending on what keys I need.  I don't keep my house and car keys on the same ring, I keep them separate because I have more on my house keys ring and I don't wan't that extra added weight on my truck ignition switch.  Wears out faster with more weight on it.  This is super easy to remove either loop depending.  I was always having to remove the whole carabiner then removing what keys I needed then re-hooking it back to my belt loop.  With this I don't have to remove the hooked carabiner type thing, just the keys I need now.  Much easier and quicker.  Very solid feel and nice look to it.  Threaded closed loop clips work great and keep your keys securely held on.  I need a few extra of the small and large rings now.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

These do work OK for the most part.  Sometimes they do come loose from either the corner clip or from one of the side clips.  I wish they had a little more bite to them.  They do work great when they do stay put.  I think it may either be from them not being adjusted properly or from the sheet not being a good enough or thick enough fabric to hold on to.  I have a large california king bed and the mattress is quite deep from top to bottom.  somewhere around 18-20" so the sheets we buy are sometimes too small for that deep of a mattress even tho they say they are, they aren't.  I think it may put too much strain on the clips to hold it because it is not the exact sized sheet for the mattress.  Granted the never come fully loose from the whole clip, but sometimes they do.  It is what it is I guess.  They do work for the most part when we do use the larger sized sheets that are cut bigger for our mattress.  Simple to use and easy to adjust.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

These are spot on replacement straps for G-Shock watches.  Only thing that is different on them is there in no G-Shock logo on the clasp.  Other than that they are identical.  Same exact, look and feel to them.  I broke the strap on my watch last week and was in need of replacement straps and these were exactly what I needed.  They fit perfectly to my G-Shock.  They even came with replacement pins for the straps also.  I was not expecting those, I was just expecting to re-use the ones in my watch.  But hey, can't complain there.  Nice to have those as backups also.  These are what you need if you need replacement straps.  They work and fit just like the OEM strap.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

These are fantastic lights.  They are well made and super bright.  Easy to put together and are sturdy.  They put out a ridiculous amount of light.  I was very surprised on how bright these actually were.  These came nicely boxed and were in perfect condition when they arrived.  These are actually better than they looked or were described.  Very good cord length on all 3 lights.  I really like the covered on/off switch on the side.  Very nice way to keep it protected from water or other debris.  These are solid lights.  They are in no way cheaply made or cheaply designed.  Very good product and have worked really well so far.  Have used all 3 and they've all performed much better than I could have expected or imagined they would.  Fantastic set of lights for sure.I received this product at a discounted price for a review.

These are a neat idea, but I have a minor issue with them.  The cleaning pad/cloth part works, but to an extent.  If you have a phone with a case on it with a edge that sticks up a bit, the cleaning pad/cloth doesn't really get all the way to the edge of the glass.  That is my only main issue with these really.  The are unique and ingenious little devices.  The stylus works well, the little stand works well, and it clips into your 3.5mm jack well.  My wife loves having it on hand for our toddler and his dirty little fingers and to keep him occupied with movies and such with the stand.  It works with basically any phone out there.  They are made of plastic, so time will only tell how long they will last and hold up.  It did come in a 3 pack so that is a nice bonus.  Overall tho, cool little stylus/stand.I received this item at a discounted price for a review.

This armband case holds the phone well, but is lacking a bit more reflective tape/paint around the arm itself.  The phone case is usually situated to the side and not facing forwards or backwards.  A bit more reflective on the armband itself would be better for safety.  Overall tho, the case is nice, size is spot on for the phone and it holds it very well.  The strap is comfortable and snug without being annoying to wear for a long period of time.  The card slot/cash pocket works great.  It will hold a couple cards or some folded up cash.  I haven't used the key slot, so I really can't comment on it, but I did put a key in it and it holds it well enough that I would feel comfortable with it.  This works really great with a nice bluetooth headset.  I am not a fan of corded heaphones while walking/running so I use sports bluetooth set to keep the wires to a minimum.  Very nicely made armband.  Good material.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

This is a bangin' little bluetooth speaker.  This little thing rocks out.  Very impressed and very, very surprised on how loud this little thing was.  It cranks out some tunes.  I use it as my jobsite speaker for work during rough in's on new home construction.  I leave it basically centered in the kitchen of the house where the island has been partially framed up and it puts out good sound to hear all throughout the whole house while we are working.  It's easily lasted 8-10hrs on a job while pulling cable and never quit.  Surprised it lasted that long.  Other ones I have only lasted about 6 hours at most.  I was bringing 2 different ones with me just so we could have music throughout the day.  Not any more with this little beast.  Very, very cool little speaker.  The range is about right at 33ft, and that is direct line of sight with it.  Anything over that and you'll buffer and the music will cut in and out until you are back in range.  I do wish they could up the range on these to about 100ft.  It can be done, Dewalt makes a bluetooth adapter for jobsite radios that has 100ft range on it.  It has to be possible with these little bluetooth speakers.  Even if it adds a few bucks more, I would gladly pay it.  I haven't tested it's waterproofing and don't plan to, so I cannot comment there about that.  It is a rugged little speaker tho.  I throw it around in my tool bag and it gets banged around, but it's still going strong to this day.  Great little speaker for sure.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

Wife loved them.  They are her new go to socks for when it is chilly and her feet are cold.  She wears them quite a bit, so she must really like them.  They are nice and soft and well made.  She has even slept with them on.  I have heard her say she really likes them and how nice and comfortable they are to wear around the house.  We have wood and tile floors, so they tend to get cold at times.  She wears them when the temperature in the house gets low enough to make the floor too cold for her to walk around barefooted.  Colors are still nice and bright even after a few washes.  Seem to be holding up well with normal usage.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

This is a great dual USB car charger.  I really like how it cycles between temp, amps and volts.  Very intuitive little device to allow you to keep tabs on your charger, phone and car.  Very easy to read even in daylight.  Big, bright, blue LED lights on the front of it.  Very solid feel to it.  Nicely designed and made.  Has worked well in all 3 of our vehicles.  It charges anything that will charge via USB.  Phones, tablets, bluetooth headsets and speakers, GoPro, battery power banks.  Anything I've hooked up to it charges just fine.  This is by no means a fast charger, wish it was honestly, but it works with everything so I am happy with it.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

To begin with, this cable is looooong at 10ft.  It works great in our van for our son when he needs to charge his iPad mini while he's in his car seat.  This reaches all the way to the 3rd row in our van and still has plenty of length left on it.  No issues with it being recognized by his iPad mini or our iPhone 6 Plus'.  Each one works with it great.  Haven't used it for data transfer or sync yet so I can't really comment on it about that, but I'd bet it works just fine with it.  It's titled as a charge and sync cable so I doubt they would just make that up to sell cables.  I am sure someone has commented on using it to sync.  Well made and well designed cable.  The price for this one is less than you'd pay for a 3ft or 6ft non Apple charge/sync cable from those brick and mortar stores out there.  I've seen off name brand cables that were no where near as nice for almost twice this price and half the length of this one.  Can't go wrong here.  Really nice and long cable that gives you some freedom when plugged in.  It's great!!I received this item at a discounted price to review.

Real nice speed rope.  This is a great rope for workouts.  Lightweight, but very well made and durable rope.  Great for cardio workouts.  Great adjust ability on the length of the rope for different sized users.  My wife has used it and even with shortening it, it still works great.  No problems with it.  Nicely designed and well made rope.  Great workout book with it.  The handles are great.  Very smooth when jumping rope with it.  Fast and tangle free use.  This is a fantastic workout tool.  Has to be one of the best speed ropes I've ever used.  I would only recommend this for indoor use tho.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

This is a great 2-Point rifle sling.  My old 2-Point sling on my Savage Axis .308 was at the end of its life basically.  I happened across this one for a good price and needless to say, pulled the trigger and ordered it.  Pun intended I guess.  Overall tho, this is a nicely made sling.  Nice clips on the ends, nice elastic and nice wide strap.  I did add some foam padding to the strap in the area where I carry it at my shoulder to relieve some of the pressure when carrying it for long periods of time.  Spray adhesive on both the strap and the foam padding and it makes one heck of a strap pad for sure.  Other than that it is spectacular.  Super easy to adjust to your desired length.  Just a fantastic sling all around for the price.  Very happy with it so far.  It has done great.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

Nice walking/running belt, but I do wish it had more reflective paint or reflective items on it.  Fit is good, comfortable to wear.  Holds basically any phone out right now.  My Note 4 fits just fine even with a case on it.  I don't use the headphone holder part due to using bluetooth headset, but I'm guessing it should be just fine for holding headphones that are wired.  Plenty of room in this also.  You can fit a phone plus a few other items no problem.  It does tend to bounce around a bit if you load it up with a multitude of things tho.  The strap and clip work just fine.  Easy to adjust to almost any sized waist.  I have also used this across my chest from my shoulder to my side and it worked well there too.  Not really a big fan of having things bouncing around while walking or running so I went to the cross chest method and it works better for me.  Overall tho, nice size waist pack.  Holds enough to keep you covered while out and about.  Just wish it had more reflective stuff on it for nighttime.I received this item at a discounted price to review

Great brush, my wife has loved this brush from day one.  She has some long and thick hair and this brush has been great for her.  She has complimented on it from the first time she's used it.  She's very happy with it overall.  Large size, easy to grip, combs nicely thru her hair whether it is wet or dry.  Only brush she uses and takes with her anywhere.  I'd say it's done quite well and become her favorite brush.  Must be good, because she is quite picky when it comes to her hair stuff.I received this item at a discounted price to review

My 3 year old had a tendency to leave his iPad mini on all the time watching YouTube Kids.  It would kill the battery life just laying there playing.  Picked up this cover/stand and have taught him how to close it up when he's not using it so the cover would put it to sleep for him.  Now he has finally learned that it will help him save battery life and has more time to use his iPad throughout the day instead of leaving it on all the time.  The iPad fits nicely into the clear back shell cover and the faux leather cover/stand is quite nice also.  Seems to be pretty durable even with a 3 year old using it.  He knows how to set it up for a stand when he wants to watch it in landscape mode.  It holds the iPad well and works really well.  Overall for the price this is a great investment for a cover/stand and to help maintain your iPad battery if need be.  Very pleased with it so far.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

My wife couldn't stomach the pill form of these.  They were upsetting her stomach for some reason.  We found this and since she's been taking it for a little over a month now, everything has been great.  No sickness, no ill effects, no change in moods or anything different.  She's been quite happy with it so far.  She has lost weight with using this along with some exercise.  I am not quite sure, but I can tell by her attitude and overall appearance that she's shed a little weight.  I dare not ask.  This tastes nothing like coffee at all, it has a sweet aroma and taste to it.  It says 20 drops a day, but she's only been using half that and has still lost weight.  She has put a small dent in the amount of liquid in a month, but she still has plenty left.  Overall, it is working, and she's happy.  That's what matters.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

Nice case.  Holds phone well.  Size is really good on the Note. It is easy to use and comfortable to wear.  The material is pretty good on it.  Nice neoprene material.  I like the back pocket for cash and maybe a credit card if needed.  Also the added key slot is nice, but I have never used it.  The case does seem like it will put up with lots of usage.  Nice reflective material used around the phone's face, but more should have been included around the armband itself for safety.  The phone isn't always facing forward or backwards at all times, so it should have reflective striping all around it.  That is my only serious issue with it.  Other than that, it works great.  Decent armband for the price.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

These are pretty good replacement low profile wiper blades.  I was kind of suspect about them seeing as I've never heard of the brand before, but I went ahead and ordered them because of the discount for a review cost.  I can say, these are actually really nice wiper blades.  They IMO are better than some name brand ones.  I really like how they attach with the locking cover.  The are smooth on the glass, no chatter at all, even at high speeds.  Here in Florida, it rains a ton and I keep Rain-X on all my glass.  That does help prolong wiper blades due to the less restrictive coating it puts on the glass itself.  These work great with it.  Have had no issues with them at all.  I will look to buy these in the future for sure because of the cost and quality of them.  Really good set of low profile wiper blades.  Very, very happy with these.  Have held up great so far.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

This works really well.  I work on ladders quite frequently throughout the week and my knees take a beating.  I have tried various things to help alleviate the pain I get in both knees.  These have helped immensely for my knees.  I use it on both knees depending on which one is bothering me.  It works great on either.  The fit is good and it is nice and comfortable.  It holds up well to wear for an extended period of time.  Nice soft material and good durable velcro to keep it attached.  I've had no issues with it while wearing it all day.  It hasn't caused any discomfort whatsoever.  Very pleased with how well it works for my knees.  Good product.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

Nice case.  Holds phone well.  Size is really good on the Note. It is easy to use and comfortable to wear.  The material is pretty good on it.  Nice neoprene material.  I like the back pocket for cash and maybe a credit card if needed.  Also the added key slot is nice, but I have never used it.  The case does seem like it will put up with lots of usage.  Nice reflective material used around the phone's face, but more should have been included around the armband itself for safety.  The phone isn't always facing forward or backwards at all times, so it should have reflective striping all around it.  That is my only serious issue with it.  Other than that, it works great.  Decent armband for the price.I received this item at a discounted price to review.

While Q-Tips usually work well I find that these work really well for opening pores. This plus an astringent sometimes means you don't have to "pop" a zit you can just open the pore, and then have it go away on its own.

EDIT:My Girlfriend used the Time Machine Backup with this device, and part way through it reported the disk was full, despite having almost a Terabyte free.  There is a maximum number of files the disk supports. The millions of small files on her system caused the system to hit that limit. Checking the forums for support this is a well documented issue, and one that WD doesn't have a solution for.As a result I have to move to a different solution. Very likely the Synology.Original:I bought this without doing enough research. I really should have gotten the Synology Synology DiskStation 2-Bay Diskless Private Cloud NAS (DS214se) but it wasn't available in 24 hours.The WD lacks the number of apps that the Synology has. While I like some of the features of the WD, there isn't anything it does that the Synology can't.Some claim the WD is more reliable, it is hard to tell. If that were the case then that is more important than anything else, but it seems equal number of people have issues with each.The WD has good Torrent download support, a decent app for remote access. The ability to host Wordpress, and a few other neat things, but over all, it is just a NAS

I was dating a girl with a good deal of ink. After getting weird looks from those who saw us together I got these so that we'd be more a like.As a bonus it cuts down on the muggings when walking in the bad parts of San Francisco, and I get my due respect from the guys in the biker gangs at my favorite bar.It would cost you a fortune to get as many tattoos as you get in this pack, and it would hurt a lot. So if you want to save money, look tough, and have a fear of needles this is the ideal choice for you.

To get these to light up I had to bend the wires a little bit. I don't think this is the fault of the bulbs, but rather the way the Jeep holds bulbs in general as I took the original out and put it back and had the same issue.These are very white. Daylight spectrum in color. The Brightness may be greater than the original, but I would say it is close to the same.There are a couple of things that make these valuable. The lower power is not an issue 90% of the time, but if you have ever accidentally left the dome light on and come back to a car that won't start you will appreciate that these use about 1/5th the power.The other advantage is that these don't have a filament. A hard bump on the trial seems to be capable of causing the rear dome light (in the 4 door) to fail.

The primary ingredient is water and orange juice. That's practically a health drink right? I'm not that deluded, but i like the taste better than the current Mt. Dew, and since sugar has less absorb-able calories than HFC by about 20% I have lost weight on this vs the Corn Syrup kind.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V9oyy0CRiNI
These are really bland. They are no where near as good as the Idahoan brand that are cheaper and easier to make.

The high quality of this sign makes it look official. That's really important when you are changing the speed of a neighborhood or highway.5 is a bit slow for a highway, but it really helps with the stretches of neighborhood that are 35 that you want to make part of your short cut. Nobody will turn on a street that looks like it is a 5mph zone, so you put up one of these and there won't be any traffic.If you ever get pulled over, you point out that it doesn't say 5 what, and that you assumed it was talking about Mach 5 which is 3800 MPH and you were going slower than that.The sign is every bit as well made as a highway sign, well sized, and made of 3m reflective coating on heavy aluminum.

These are nearly an exact match for my Apartments flooring. I use them for a number of things. In the kitchen they make a nice "anti-fatigue" mat so that when cooking my legs don't get tired. But also because I can pick them up and wash them I feel like they are cleaner than the floor.I placed two under my subwoofer so that noise would not travel through the floor to neighbors.I used the rest in my foyer to cut down the echo, so that when I am on a call with someone it is easier to hear them.My friend is ordering a set to put under her massage table to cut down on the creaking of the table, and to reduce fatigue as she stands there all day.I am contemplating using them as a "bed liner" in the back of my jeep since they would cut down on noise and protect the interior when hauling things. My girlfriend thinks I am a little obsessed with these. But for the price they are amazing.

The bendy is cool, but really these were purchased so that one can drink water from a standard water bottle while sick in bed. They work really well for that. I'm sure kids find the bendy part cool, but as an Adult I don't need to have my liquids pass through loopty loops before reaching my mouth.Yes, I woke up one day old and cranky, but you'd never know it because of my colorful plastic sippy straw.

The Inverter works well. The jump start works well. But the inflator not so much. This jump started my GirlFriend's Volvo 12 times and still showed 75% charge. It will charge your phone like 400 times. In that sense it is amazing. And that is what I bought it for.The Tire Inflator however wouldn't fill up a tire in 45 minutes. There is a thermal cutout and if you run it for 5 minutes it stops. It took about 45 minutes to take do a tire that was only under inflated.

If you are going to drop the nearly $2k on this monitor you will need to understand that likely you will need to drop another $300 on a video card to use it. The Nvidia 900 series works well (960 GTX is a good starting point). If you don't have a DisplayPort1.3 video card it is likely you will have issues. While the monitor supports using 2 DP1.2's or dual HDMI, because the resolution is non-standard you may have other issues.This monitor has great color reproduction, and 5k at 60hz looks great, but you aren't going to have the smoothest Hulu or Netflix experience at full resolution. So you should also be prepared to use a resolution manager when you need to run things that were not designed for this level of detail.The speakers on this leave a lot to be desired but again if you are going to drop $2000 on a monitor, likely you can afford better speakers that sit on your desktop or book shelf.I gave this a 5 star rating, but.... To be honest if you are looking at $2k worth of monitor you might be happier with 3 monitors at WQHD (2560x1440) as you can get 28 inches x3 for about the same price, and for many work flows and gaming experiences this will be a better setup.Even two 4k Monitors might be a better option.If you are really bawler however you can put two Nvidia 960's in a computer and run dual 5k and that is a very enviable setup for Graphic design or Video Editing.I know for me the decision to go with this monitor was driven by video editing.

Read the instructions, you need to know how many times to press the clicker while the learn light is on, but this clicker will work with pretty much any garage door on the market. That makes it worth getting just so you don't have to wonder about compatibility. It has dip switches but you likely will never have to mess with it.

These are really good for what they are. They are cheaply made, but they hold up for a few uses and you don't care if a personality walks off with one still attached. I get lots, mic everybody, and then plug them in to a wireless mic pack.These also work well for Skype and video conferencing so you can make sure just you gets picked up not the whole room.

This worked REALLY well. I was surprised. The previous owner of my car had blackened the headlights, and I needed to remove that. That is not what this is designed for and I was worried. I used two sets of this primarily because the black out spray gummed up the sanding pads pretty fast, but the result was that I could see down the road again. I would give it 6 stars.Mother's often make great products so I shouldn't have been that surprised, but considering my use case was a worst case scenario this was impressive.
Only about 4 cards in the deck have any amount of steam punk to them. And that is pretty non-punky.The box is the only cool part of this deck.

Understand that 500 lumens is not enough for much larger than a 60 inch screen, and that there are a lot of projectors that are superior in resolution and brightness from Optoma. There is currently not a reason to buy this model. Get a 1080p Optoma instead. And don't consider anything less than 2000 lumens.You will be unhappy.EDIT:A comment was left that this was a great unit for its size... For $25 more you can get the 700 lumen version, which also has better contrast and more accurate colors. The ML550 is never the right choice. It is a discontinued model that competes with sub $200 units.This model is further hampered by the fact that Optoma was just getting in to 3D when this came out and as a result the compatibility is extremely limited even with Optoma's own 3D products.

Understand that this is a "Shift 4k" projector not a "true 4k" projector which is why the lumens are low, and the price is cheap.The resulting picture is much sharper than a 1080p Projector, and for 4k 24hz content you'd be hard pressed to tell the difference, but you have to understand that this is using multiple passes to achieve the resolution. Basically 24hz is presented at 96hz and the image is shifted 4 times to make the image.The result works pretty well, and keeps cost down. It also give Huge contrast ratios.Where it is limiting is that you lose a LOT of brightness. This is fine if you are doing 120 inches, but 200 inches will push this to a level of darkness that will make watching not so fun.This is definitely not the choice if you don't have a totally dark room.As there is not a lot of 4k content right now, and HDMI doesn't have content protection for 4K yet, I can't recommend this projector for anyone.

Modern Laptops don't have VGA ports, But a lot of companies don't have HDMI on their old projectors. Keeping this in my bag makes certain I won't have issues when doing a presentation. This seems to be very much the case with large hotel venues that have daylight capable projectors that were very expensive and they have never upgraded.Be aware you may have to add a custom resolution in your display settings, I found that my laptop only wanted to do 16:9 resolutions and I had to add 800x600 and 640x480 and to make sure they were at 60hz.

BenQ has truer colors than the Optoma's in the same price range, but shorter bulb life, shorter warranty, and less lumens. You would likely be better to save $30 and get an Optoma that is slightly better than this unit, or spend an extra $30 and get one that is a LOT better than this unit.BenQ bulbs are more expensive, they burn out faster, and aren't as bright. Also note that the BenQ's are noisier than the Optoma's.In this price range you can do better.

Bang for the buck this is hard to beat. There are a few things to note however. Optima picked some weird color setting to improve the specs of this projector. To get the full contrast you have to put up with a lot if banding in the middle of the range and over saturated colors. This is less of an issue with Video Games than Movies. And more of an issue if you are looking at this for a Daylight projector than a Darkened room.The 3000 lumens preforms well and if you are looking for a projector to connect to your Xbox this a great choice. If you are looking for a 200 inch screen this will not cut it. This is great for rooms up to about 110 inches if darkened and 60 inches if daylight.The speaker is not awesome but is a nice addition for when you want to have a pool party or do something else where you wouldn't have a sound system to hook up to.For an office projector this works really well, and the number of input ports will allow you to have an HDMI with a Apple Adapter and an HDMI without on your conference table which will make hooking up much easier.

Understand this is a cheap projector. Because it is low resolution (800x600) it doesn't make a good projector for Powerpoints, and because it is a 4:3 aspect ratio it makes a poor movie projector.The brightness and contrast don't make this a good 3D Projector.If you are looking for something cheap for a one time party, this is not a bad choice, but short of that you'd be better served by something that is true 1080p or at least 720p ( 1280x720p or 1280x800 ). The ViewSonic PJD5533W is about $100 more is better from the resolution stand point.

Read the fine print. This only works through Mac OS 10.9 (Not Yosemite).This is a deal breaker if you want to do anything current.It is unlikely that you want this adapter as computer it would work on can be updated to Yosemite for free.

Drawer is so well hidden you can't find it. (it doesn't exist)Reclaimed look is synonymous with "It looks like you went dumpster diving" as opposed to "rustic" or "Industrial"This is poorly made. Wobbly. Won't hod much weight. The couch in the picture must be really low to the ground because this thing is short.Save your money and dig an end table out of the trash, or construct one out of the free straws from McDonald's because that wouldn't be any worse.

Accept that this is a $20+ dog toy. At some point a Vulli founder made a deal with the devil to have the most perfect squeaky dog toy for your baby, and this is the result.The neck is just the right size for a range of baby hands to grip.The legs are squishy enough they don't poke a baby's eye out when they bash them in to their head, or the head of another baby.The head is close enough to a pacifier head that it will do in a pinch.The spots make hit hard to tell that it is covered in dried baby food so people won't judge you that it is filthy.The squeak sounds like little happy baby cooing and won't drive you insane.The shape makes it impossible for it to roll away so it gets out of reach less.So accept that this is hugely expensive for what should be a $3 dog toy at PetCo. If this is on your friend's registry this is the item you buy. Their child will love it. Make sure you write in permanent non-toxic ink. "To <Baby name> with Love <your name>" on the actual toy so you get credit, because for the next 18 months this toy is going to be the only thing that makes baby stop crying, go to sleep, and cause tears to flow when it is more than 9 inches from baby's mouth.You buy this and you are a hero. All other squeaky toys are inferior.

The picture makes the color around the edge look much more Brown than mine was. It is very much red. The "Cross" in the center of the image that looks to be black, dark brown, and tan/beige is acutally black and red.The colors were enough different I thought I had received the wrong item.All of that said, the rug is nicely made. Soft to the touch. Thick enough to sit on comfortably on a hard wood floor, and while I'm not likely to play legos on it, I think it would be a great choice for a kid wanting to do that. The length of the strands is such that things won't get lost in it, and the density is such that you could push a hot wheels on it.I don't know how better to describe a rug. It would be 5 stars if it were the colors I thought it was, but is 4 since it is much redder, and I don't have that color in my room's pallet.

The ability to "sit up" in bed adds about $60 to the price of this frame. If you have ever had pneumonia, or bronchitis where they encourage you to sit up, this bed will pay for itself the first time you need that. Or if you get pregnant, or break your leg.So I bought this as an insurance policy. I'm unlikely to get pregnant being a male, but with advances in science you never know.In the mean time I have found that days when I just want to work from bed this is a decent choice. You don't need strength to operate the mechanism, but you need to be strong enough to lift the mattress. I'm a 6'3" 225 pound male so lifting my 12 inch King size memory foam mattress is no big deal, but there is no way my 115 pound Girlfriend is lifting the mattress to change the bed position.

I didn't need all of the parts, but it was only about $1 more to get this than just the part I needed (the valve at the top of the tower.Fluidmaster is well made, the parts are mostly high grade plastic which means they won't rust or corrode. They are also made of a calcium resistant material so they don't get calcium build up as quickly as other brands I have used.These are easy to install, and work with most toilets. I'd tell you I like the stylish Grey, Black, and Red color scheme, but you can't see it once installed, so it mostly goes unnoticed.

This is what you will want to connect a "good mic" to your DSLR. Most of the best mics are XLR and most of the best prosumer camera's are 3.5mm (also call 1/8th inch).The right angle on the 3.5mm end makes it less likely to get hung up on something, or damage the jack on your camera.This is well made, has held up well, and works as advertised. Great price as well.

Mastication pretty much means "chews". This juicer slowly (very slowly) chews your fruits or vegetables. The result is that unlike a press juicer, or a just "juicer" you get less juice per thing you stick in to it.The "Quiet" motor is synonymous with "under powered" so the life span of this juicer is about 90 days at best if you stick to grapes, and well ripened mushy apples. Much less if you choose carrots, celery, and crisp apples.Buy a cow, it will masticate better in addition to giving you milk. If you don't have room for a cow, I suspect for the price I could hire an illegal immigrant to chew my produce and spit it in to a cup, I'd get true mastication, and greater reliability. Don't waste your money. This is a $10 product being sold at an $80 price tag. Even that might be generous.

My girlfriend had trouble with a neighbor who was harassing her and her room mates. I installed 1 of these on the outside of the house, and then went over and picked an argument. Then I pointed it out. He hasn't bothered them since.You can position the "camera" inside these, but the red blinking light is the most important thing. Make sure that when someone steps where they shouldn't be they see the blinking red.These work primarily because bad people tend to be stupid people. Why you would have a blinking red light on a camera is beyond me, but these work because the kind of person who does something illegal likely has only ever seen an old VHS camcorder with a flashing red tally light.

I absolutely love this white board! I was pleasantly surprised when I opened it to see the size and how many fun magnets came with it.I've started using this weekly to write our family's schedule on and then I hang it on the fridge.  Every day my kids (and husband) can look to see what school I am subbing at and what activities they have in the afternoon or appointments I might be taking them out of school forOnce a week, I sit down with the board and my calendar and just write out the whole week..I honestly wish I'd thought of this year's ago.  It's been a wonderful addition to my scheduling things.  The board is an excellent size for a week's worth of activities, the magnets are strong and it doesn't move around from people opening and closing the fridge, and the dry erase marker has lasted through many weekly updates.I would highly recommend this to anyone! Great white board!I received this at a discount for my honest review.

I absolutely love this bracelet. It is so shiny, simple, and pretty. The copper hasn't scratched at all and I wear it with other metal bracelets.I was happy to see it was easily adjustable because I have small wrists.  I'm not sure how well it works for wrist pain because my own pain is in my knuckles vs my wrists. I was hoping that it would radiate out and help my hands.  I think it does help a bit with that because the hand I have it on always seems to hurt a little bit less than the other.Whether it helps with pain or not, I would still wear it because I adore the style of it.  It's truly a beautiful bracelet!I received this at a discount for my honest review.

Gorgeous bracelet! I absolutely love the design.  It is comfortable to wear and I usually forget that I have it on. The only problem is that a slight pull on it makes the latch come undone. Luckily I have felt it each time and I haven't lost it.  The first time I thought it was broke, but the latch had just opened.I do love wearing this with the matching earrings. No just have to watch and make sure it doesn't come undone.I received this at a discount for my honest review.

Very pretty pair of earrings. They don't sag when you put them on your ears and wear them all day and they are very eye catching.The only problem I had is that after wearing them for a few hours my ear lobes start to hurt.  I don't have overly sensitive ears, I wear a lot of earrings that aren't specifically made for sensitive ears without problems.  These though, as much as I love the look, I can barely wear for a full day of work because of how sore my ear lobes get. They come out the minute I walk in the door.  I wash them before and after wearing them, hoping to get used to them because I really love the design and how eye catching/sparkling they are.For someone like my daughter who has to wear earrings for sensitive ears, these wouldn't work for long without pain.I received these at a discount for my honey review
Adorable Ever After High doll! I grabbed this for my soon to be 9 year olds birthday and it's exactly what I expect for these dolls.  Duchess Swan is beautiful! She will love her!

I bought these for my daughter's birthday to wear at competitions in between dance and on stage because they match her studio jacket (red/black).She wears a size women's 6 so I grabbed a medium and I think I could have gone with a small, even with putting them over her dance shoes.I'm not sending them back though because she will only be 9 and after seeing them, I hope they will last a couple of years.They are really comfy (I tried them on because it's not her birthday yet). I wear a size 7 1/2 and they fit me easily.  Love the style, the colors were just as pictures.

Adorable knee high socks! We got these for my daughter's friend for her birthday. She has a slight obsession with funky knee highs.These were just what I expected when they got here.  Bright colors, great fabric, good length for her, and I love the unicorn shooting the rainbow out of his toosh.  These ended up being my favorite pair I bought her and my girls each want a pair now.

Adorable knee high socks! We got these for my daughter's friend for her birthday. She has a slight obsession with funky knee highs.These were just what I expected when they got here.  Bright colors, great fabric, good length for her, and a really fun design. Loved the wings!

Anyone else squeal when they found out that Ilsa Madden-Mills had a new release coming out?  When the cover released my excitement for release day amped up times 100.  That is one hot cover.I have followed Ilsa since she released Very Bad Things.  I have loved each new book she releases more than the last. And now I am totally head over heals for Declan in Dirty English.  Little bit of a cougar thing going on over here for a fictional character.I have to share that I literally fell asleep reading this because I started late at night. I couldnt bring myself to stop because I was so into it. I woke up when my iPad (mini, thank goodness) smacked me in the side of the cheek. I thought about picking it up and continuing, but I had to get up at 6 for work and it was already 2. I finished as soon as I got home from work. One of those books I did not want to put down for anything.Elizabeth had a rough start in life and then went through a horrible trauma that completely has shaped who she is now as we enter the story.  I dont think she even knows how strong she truly is.  She doesnt let her upbringing take her down, she is determined to be more.  Add to that what she went through in high school shes still standing.  Broken, but standing.Declan has had his own share of heartache in his life and the way he looks is completely opposite of who he actually is.  (Dont judge a book by its cover in the human sense, but when it comes to Dirty English, you totally can.)  Hes tattooed, hes a fighter, and hes the sexiest man on campus (its true, there was a vote).  He looks like the bad boy everyone would swoon over, but inside thats not who he is.I loved Dirty English!  Possibly more than I loved the Briarcrest Academy series, and that is saying a lot.  Complex characters that I could empathize with, a great storyline, awesome friends that have each others backs (even when they dont agree), and hot scenes that leave you wanting your own Declan made this an amazing book!5 hot Dirty English stars from me!Now, we need Daxs book!Thank you for my copy of Dirty English! I honestly thoroughly loved it!

I grabbed Vigilance when it was on sale for 99 cents.  Not only is it by an author whose other works I had on my Kindle Wish List, it came recommended by my friend Laura.  Shes one of my go to tell me what to read next friends.  Shes introduced me to some amazing books before.Im a huge zombie fan, its a thing for our family, we love zombies, we love pretending we are planning for the zombie apocalypse (with the kids) (not that I necessarily want to live through it), its just some (possibly twisted) fun for us.  When Laura said this was a must read, it surprised me because typically she sends me the book that will wring every last emotion from me.  Zombie apocalypse?  Im all over it.Vigilance was really cool.  Instead of being just a telling of how people fought the zombies and survived, this is a set of journal entries that were either found or turned over to the archivist.  It details what each of these people went through at the beginning of the zombie craziness and whether they survived or not.The journal entries come from both men and women, people of different ages, from different cities in the US, and the writing style of each character is uniquely their own.  No one sounds like a person you read a few entries previously, no one reminds you of another character, each character is written in their own individual tone.  That cant be an easy task for an author to take on.  L.G. Pace III excels at it.I have to say I think this is my most favorite zombie book I have ever read.  It was different that any other book in this genre that I have ever read.Im so glad my friend told me this was a must read because I totally agree.5 zombie loving stars from me!

I first saw this game a couple of months ago at my son's occupational therapy.  He loved it there (he's 6, which is younger than the recommended ages).  I promised him after his last appointment that if he finished his session (he was having a rough day) that I would buy this game to play with him.  That was enough motivation.All of my family loves this.  For the youngest we change the rules (everyone who completes the puzzle correctly wins) and we go slow, usually he picks a card he thinks he can do.  For the rest of us, it's fast and furious.  Awesome family game!  My 8 year old can play it with the regular rules but it's still tough enough at times that I'm left really analyzing the card to figure out exactly what it is I am doing.Excellent family game!

The Devils Metal is all sex, drugs, and rock and roll on the way to Hell.  Quite possibly literally.This was one of the books I didnt read the blurb for.  I knew it was by Karina Halle and I grabbed it knowing that I love her work.  I didnt know if this was going to be one of her more paranormal styles or one that would be a straight rock god romance.I am so glad I didnt read the blurb.  I was reading along, thinking this is going to not have any paranormal aspect to it, its pure 70s.  (Though I was born in the middle 70s, I dont remember much beyond my Sesame Street bell bottom overalls, to me she hit the 70s dead on with her descriptions, the clothes, the hair, the music, the days of writing letters and finding payphones.  I felt like I was right back there, seeing what it was like in the decade that I was born in.)  Back to what I was saying, I would be reading along and come across a sentence or two that left me wondering are we entering the paranormal or did Dawn take acid and I didnt catch it or is she losing her ever loving mind?Freaky is the one word that comes to mind about my feelings when I finished this book.  Freaky.  Karina wrote this story in such a way that while it is paranormal, it left you thinking like that could have actually happened.  It would explain a lot in that decade.Theres two ways that I feel when I am reading a book.  One is where I feel like I am as much a part of the story as the characters are, the second is where I feel like I am an outsider looking in.  The second is what I felt here.
