The length has it's pros and cons.  9" is about right for using as an Amp lead between a power source and load.  However its a bit short for parallel runs for voltage readings.  I'd like to see an option for about 18" leads.  All-in-all they are great leads and a must for electrical and electronics tinkerers...

Cagalli brings the fight to the enemy and is ready to stand with you.  She's about a 1:7 scale by looking at her.  She's PVC and painted on all exposed surfaces.  This figure is from the "Desert Tiger" arc in season one of Gundam Seed.  The detail isn't too bad, but the skin pigment is a little off.  She's what I would call sunburn red.  A little too much attention to detail IMHO.  But I'm sure this is a manufacturing variation.  Still though, it's not awful.  R.A.H.D.X. manufactures some decent "Teir 2" figures that are still good pieces.  In any case, for any GS fan, "battle field Cagalli" is a must have.  One further point, although this is a seller's market since this figure is out of production, be weary of sellers that will ask $200-300 for this piece.  She's a decent display figure at $40-60, she's a definete pass up from there...A word on my figurine reviews.  This is not a toy, nor is it intended for children.  I rate figuines as having no eductational value, since to be frank, they don't.  Durability dispite being a PVC figure is moderate.  If she's is constantly handled, she will break.  If place on a shelf and left undisturbed, she will stand for many years to come.

Zoids wasn't as popular here in the US as other giant robot Anime shows.  However it's near and dear to me.  I've wanted to find a Moonbay figurine for a while.  In any case I fianlly did!  She's smaller, probably a 1:8 scale or so.  The make is TOMY so it's not a "top shelf" manufacturer...but beggers can't be choosy.  She's painted on all exposed surfaces.  The base isn't bad but she's definiely about a $20 figure for quality.  The price here on Amazon was a bit steeper than that but again, can't be picky.  Her colors aren't bad and although the detail isn't flawless, it's not bad either.  All in all, I'm pleased.A words about my reviews...  Depite what Amazon lists them as, Anime figurines ane not toys.  Not by their content, nor by their intended usage.  This figurine is not for children.  I rate figrines as having no educational value, since honestly, they don't.  I rate them as having moderate durability.  Although she is made of PVC, it's she's constantly handled, eventually she will break.  Place her on your display shelf, and she will stand proudly  years to come.

This is used to convert you 50A RV electric serivce to a weatherproof detachable cord setup that serves a couple of useful purposes.  First:  You don't have a hatch and weak point of entry to let critters into your rig and give them access to the last place you want them (your power system)!  Second:  You don't have a big heavy cord that is tangled and a mess coming through a 8x8 hole.  Third:  Scrappers won't have an easy time stealing your VERY expensive power RV cable for $10 worth of copper.  Last:  You have access to a variety of adaptors that are equaly weatherproof and allow you to connect your rig to anything from a 15A home recepticle, to 30A RV connections, or even to a locking plug on a generator.What you will need...  An existing 50A service and exisiting 6/3 w/ Ground RV cord.  A length of 6/3 w/ ground copper wire (to connect from the recepticle on the wall of the rig to the RV breaker box and converter.)  A hole saw (sizing may vary from my installation since I bought a slighlty different model.)  And ideally a way to plug an replace (cover) the existing hatch.  As seen in the photo, it comes with the wall recepticle.  And a water tight female locking plug end to plug into that.  I don't particularly care for the rosette that comes with it as it's a little small.  Larger would better.  With all that goes into it, this is one install you might want to leave to your RV professional.  However the finished product is worth every $ and aggrivating moment of install you encounter.

I love the Speedbor Max.  If you've only ever used traditional spade bits and hole saws, then you've been living in the past.  The 21st century brings us the amaziningly quick tri-blade speedbor max.  I used these on a recent rewiring project and electrical system upgrade.  I needed to drill LOTS of holes in REAL 2" hardwood joists.  These paired with my 18V Dewalt cordless drill made that a very quick undertaking.  They have a pilot thread that makes centering the hold easy.  And once they start boring, they bore through with speed!  Pardon the shameless pun.  Even though they cut quickly and the cuts are a little rough, they aren't nearly as rough as you would expect for the quickness.  And there's no blowout on the otherside.  Bottom line, these work!  The set comes in a nice softside zippered case that keeps them from getting lost.  I've used my 7/8" the most and after a years worth of abuse, it's still going strong.  If there is any down side to these, it would be the length.  The overall length, plus the length of my drill makes getting them between 16" centered studs and joists challenging.  You have to start the cut at a slight angle.  But you cant straighten it out once you hit the middle of the material.

I'm using this for an RV battery.  The leads let me mount this to the battery before the cut-off switch.  I can plug in a battery tender to keep the battery charged in the off season.  The positive side has an ATC fuse with a weather proof cover.  The ring terminals are solid and will fit 5/16" terminals.  The battery can stay in the box, hatch, or under a hood.  The connector stays in place while on the road tucked away with a twist tie.  Because its 12VDC, the 2 prong plug is water resistant and more or less weather proof.  Just make sure you keep the 120V charger out of the water and elements. Bottom line this little gadget serves my purposes ver well.  Note: this will not work with CTEK brand chargers...

I ordered these king sheets October 18, 2014 and received in April 2015.  Finally, in November 2015 I am using them.  My husband has commented twice that "these sheets are very comfortable."  I think he likes them, I certainly do.  They are a darker color than shown but with all the purples, lavenders and lilacs that I have in our bedroom, these sheets match everything just fine.  The ARE comfortable and more than big enough for our 18" mattress.  I washed and dried in dryer before using them and they have done very well.  I would buy them again.

Who says you can't have humor in a mystery, love story, family love and good rollicking fun with a story like this.  I loved this book and recommend for the most hard hearted person you might know because it will make them feel good.
My husband likes the belt unfortunatley it is too wide for most of his pants.  Won't fit through jean.
Bright WHITE light.  Just what I wanted.  I do not like yellow or pink light, I prefer bright blue white light.
Excellent protection for hands with hot pans from oven.  Could be just a smidgen larger.  I haven't found a use for the small brush.

It's VERY heavy for a pillow between 8-10 pounds for a king size.  I've been using it for a few months and still getting used to it.  It's difficult to move with my arthritic hands and a bad right shoulder.  I may have to go back to my down pillows.  This pillow IS comfortable, just hard to move around.  It helps with a bad back and sore neck.  I don't think it is shredded, I believe it is two layers of folded foam.It takes two days for the bad smell to go away.  I put it in the sun on the deck for a day and then in the dryer with dryer sheets for a couple of hours, then back to deck for the remainder of the day.  You'll have to wait at least two days to use.
This is a natural looking product that I love and so ordered two so as not to run out in a year or so.
Now that I have it I find I don't use it as often as I thought.  However, as a passenger, I need to put it on THAT side of the car.
It was there before I looked for it.

OK, I'm hooked.  Fake it till you make it for sure.  When Number Four meets another Number Four at midnight and is free to ask any questions about their supposed immortality that makes him nervous about what to ask and his surprise to learn that there is another Number Four, and another and everyone lives with no windows forever.  Have you ever been outside, he asked?  "Twice" was the response, but no explanations for reasons given.  Questions can be asked but no guarantee of an acceptable answer as the answers are more often than not evasive.  Deeper and deeper we go into the mystery of ESI.

These are a great pair of headphones which were provided to me for my review.I like that the plug is angled for a very good fit and hold in the connector.  The sound quality is good.  The ear buds come with three sizes, S, M, & L to assure a good fit.  I was impressed with the sound, the ear bud fit, the angled plug and the fabric covered wire which makes for less tangle as you wrap it up to fit into it's own handy fabric bag.  Of course, some folks might be annoyed with the noise when the cable rubs against the fabric.  I think these are made for Apple products as the little push button used to skip songs, etc. on the cable doesn't work on other MP3 Players.I wasn't wild about the "bling" but for free I can't be unhappy about it.  Overall, I can gladly give these earphones a B+ and 4.5 stars.  I apologize to the Seller for my late review, I was too busy enjoying the free gift...Thank You!

This was my first reading of a Mary Higgins Clark novel and I was very pleasantly surprised and pleased with the mature and developed writing style of the author as she keeps the story moving right along, tripping you up just as you think you have things figured out.  I've heard her name seemingly all my life so I thought to give her a try.  I researched her a little and discovered a real woman who loves her work and can't stop.  I'm glad.  I hope to read more of her as my remaining time permits.  Life grows shorter and we must choose wisely.A Cry in the Night is exactly that, a woman who becomes trapped by what she thought she wanted.

Eden Can Wait, Episode 1 and Episode 2 were FREE so, of course, I gobbled them up.  Be careful what you take in because it will take you over.  I'm hooked, I bought Episode 3 and finished it yesterday and immediately went to buy Episode 4.  I hate myself for falling for "serials."  I hope that I will become disenchanted but his writing is so darn good and the story line so different that I can't stop.  I've bought up his other writings as well.  Damn you Ray Kuili and welcome to my world.

I have oily skin so I don't use most skin products claiming eternal youth and the removal of any sign of aging.  Nearing 70 years (bite your tongue) of age very soon, I took a chance on this Alina Skin Care Enhance Vitamin C Serum and I am glad I did.  I have tried a couple of others that did well enough but this particular one is the one for me.  It encourages the use before moisturizer.  This IS my moisturizer.  The pump applicator gives just enough for one use on face, neck AND the backs of my hands.  And to top it off, the fragrance is divine.  I love the hint of the citrus.  It's very refreshing.  If I should use my Bare Minerals or Bare Escentuals Liquid make up, my face is not left with that dreaded cakey look on my Fairly Medium and Bare Satin 06.I have begun to notice tiny lines or crinkles on my eyelids and this was the real reason for using this scrumptious serum which was provided to me free of charge for my honest opinion.  Please send more and I will give you another honest opinion.

I think these are the EXACT knives that I needed.  I only needed one steak knife to complete my set of six in the Henckels knife block.  I suspect that the missing knife went out with a pizza box as I have searched high and low for it.  Finally, my husband tiring of hearing me complain and watching me tear the house up looking for it, found these wonderful Henckels Eversharp Pro Steak Knives right here on Amazon and suggested that I order them.  I did and I am delighted with his suggestion and no hesitation on my part.  Of course, I cut the end of one finger getting them open from a blister pack with a special blister pack opener but still managing to cut myself as they were delivered at Noonish today.  The box is all bloody as I taped it back up to throw out in tomorrow's trash pick up.  I am absolutely thrilled with these new knives.  I've placed four new ones in the wooden knife block and the remaining older ones in the plastic form fit holder for the knives and will keep them somewhere for the future.  I was very tempted to order another set of these and made myself stop.  I do not need them.

Absolutely perfect for the uses I need it for.  I lost a wonderful Henckels Utility knife about five years ago (I'm pretty sure it went out in a pizza box) and a puny little paring knife did not adequately replace it.  However, this knife is perfect for me and fits into the wooden block as if it were made to be there.
The Seller, Pandora's, reviews sold us.  The Bake Element Part was absolutely PERFECT for our old Frigidaire Model #FEF355CFSB.  Couldn't be happier.  Heated up to 450 degrees in no time.

However, I am keeping them because they are the same maker, SUPERIOR with the idol of a gold lion above the name and sewn into the washcloth on the back, the same as the 4-pack set of MAROON towels I purchased very recently, and ALL from the same Seller, Dealway (I am still happy with Seller).  I like them so much that I wanted the washcloths and the hand towels to match.  Well, I thought I had found the washcloths. The washcloths I purchased on April 3rd are ITALIAN 100% Egyptian Cotton 4 PC Washcloth Set, MAROON - but like I said, they are very clearly marked BURGUNDY.  Double damn and spittle flying everywhere!  My husband says they are close enough and for me to take a chill pill and "just let it go."  Good!  And Amazon even delivered to my front door on Easter.  So instead of an Easter Basket, I got an Amazon Package - much better!
I bought for a family member last Christmas.  Finally, he told me he loves them and he likes the lighter weight cotton jersey for the summer.

I love drinking Matcha green tea because it has high amount of antioxidants. It also taste good specially the good quality one. I don't consider myself an expert in matcha green tea but I tried a lot of brands so far. You need to know its not always easy to find the best Matcha and comparing brands side by side will give you better idea. some tips you need to know 1- the origin, grades and which part of plants matcha comes from, color, taste and finally how to prepare each grade matcha.There Isnt any formal or universal grading system for matcha but will list the most common two grades I found.- Ceremonial grade: Made from shade-grown green tea leaves harvested and then stone-ground to a very fine powder. Good for drinking straight and taste really good.- Ingredient/ culinary/ kitchen grade matcha which is best when used in recipes for matcha lattes, smoothies, shakes, ice cream, baking, etc. the taste is more strong and maybe bitter to maintain its aroma and flavor when mixed with other ingredients. You can also consume as a brewed drink with more bitterness than the ceremonial grade matcha if you are ok with that.now for this brand "Enzo MATCHA Green Tea Powder" . Here what I found:- The color of this Matcha green tea is brighter green compared to other culinary grades I have tried. It is actually the best green color among  three culinary grades I tried so far.- The taste is still bitter  but less compare to others. I tried drinking straight and the taste is bitter and that normal for this grade! I prefer the Ceremonial grade for cup of matcha.- Powder: fine green powder.- I tried it for  smoothies, and baking and the results are greatthis one stays on the top of my culinary grade brands and really recommend itI received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. If you have any question please leave it in comment section and I will try my best to answer it. Thanks

I usually stay away from reviewing debated topics that involved some since to it lol.the since behind Air ionizer is like that: Instead of filtering the air like using regular filter, ionizer devices emit ions, which are essentially just molecules that have a positive or negative charge. The idea is that ionized particles of various allergens and odorous materials will either stick to surfaces or each other, at which point they wont be floating air anymore.I still can't prove all that claims as a regular customer. For me I have allergy and seasonal asthma and I need every help to reduce getting sick. This device works when plug it in my car. no noise and no weird actions. I have baby too sometime ride with me and reducing this particles will help. to be quit honest its hard to notice any changes because as I mentioned above this work mini particles and ions field. I still need to clean my car from inside everyone and then. these particle s that stick to car surfaces need to be clean out or it will rebuild and re-grow again. So i'm giving the device 5 stars because its keep working with no issues. I receive it for free for evaluation purpose. and will update my review if something need to be corrected. Thanks

I have using this for a month now and every time I use it get in love more and more. There are some reasons that why I use french press over my drip machine:In french press the coffee seeps and water does not run through it quickly. When you brew coffee using drip machine with paper filter all oils and sediment that occur naturally in coffee beans is filtered out. In french press, the only thing you don''t drink is the ground coffee- everything else is included in your cup and it allows you to fully appreciate all that coffee has to offer. One other reason, proper water temperature (196-200) for the duration. when using french press you can control your water temperature and time of brewing, by controlling I mean manually doing that and you have the full control which is totally different in case of drip machine (well most of them).Now for the product itself: as I said I use this for month now almost every morning and some nights when I feel I need good coffee during my homework or finishing paper work,Pros:- Good quality well made and sturdy stainless steel french press. very shiny and will not be afraid of breaking anything since its make fully stainless steel.- Nice and fine stainless steel filter, that works very well with my coarse grind coffee beans.- Sturdy one piece unit with very well fit and secure top led.- The plunger with led and filter fit tight and secured inside coffee press. and when you press there is no ground coffee leak from in between.- I feel very safe putting it dish washer with no problems.I'm still doing a lot of practice to reach the best brewing coffee and here what I reach so far: The king of coffee, coffee roast and coffee grind all mater in making any coffee.- I buy whole coffee beans that already roasted ( I use to roast my beans, I stop now it needs a lot of time and outdoor space because of smoke). I grid my coffee manually the amount I need before I brew my coffee so I get the most fresh and oil from my coffee.- There are many recommendation for the coffee water ratio but I really can't give you one here. I always change my ratio from time to time according to may thing (coffee kind, roast and my mode too).- Your grind should be coarse. There is way to know if your grind too fine or too coarse is when you press the filter down. If the grounds are too fine, you'll have a hard time pressing it down. If you can push the filter down with absolutely no resistance, then the grounds are too coarse.- I heat water while I'm grinding coffee, I add coffee to beaker then add some water to just cover the coffee and then stir. I wait one minute then add the whole water to the top (assuming i'm doing coffee for 4 people). Then cover it secured and wait from 4 to 5 min. and press the plunger. Thats it and your beautiful fresh smooth coffee is ready.This product was provided at a discount for an honest and unbiased review. If you have any question please leave it in comment section and I will try my best to answer it. Thanks

If you like to watch coming of age movies, this one will not let you down.  Lou Pucci, young actor in the leading role also earned recognition for his acting in the Sundance Festival.  But this movie is full of big name actors and they all deliver a fabulous piece of work.  This of: Tilda Swinton, Vincent D' Onforio, Keanu Reeves and Vince Vaughn.It is not easy to be a teenager, no matter where you live, who you are, who your family is and what your real or perceived talents are.  So the main character is in search of his own self.  He is cute but insecure, smart but not truly realizing his potential, partly due to distractions all normal teenagers face: girls, craving for acceptance, pressure of choosing the next step after college - which school to go to, whether to stay close to home or move away...  To make things worse, to deal with all social pressures around him and reduce anxiety, the young main is - guess what - sucking his thumb - to enormous annoyance of his jock father.It is cute to see all twists and turns this young man is trying n order to be "normal".  He joins school's debate club, he starts having sex with a girl he genuinely cares for, but for her he is just a sex toy, he even tries drugs, both legal and illegal (retalin and marijuana).  This is a kind of dark comedy/coming of age movie that at the end will leave you smiling form all possibilities that a young person has ahead of them.  Somehow, long after movie I kept thinking that a young person like that will have a very few missed opportunities in his life.  He is so hungry for life that he simply will not settle for mediocre.

During my recently vacation to new Mexico, I decided to pick up several movies from my local library and take them on my vacation.  "Tetro" was one of them.  Sure enough there were two main factors for choosing this movie: it features Vincent Gallo one of the best character actors and the fact that this film was directed by Francis Ford Coppola.  Film is shot completely in black and white with flashbacks in color.  I liked that movie had  international actors and the fact that Claus Maria Brendauer was in it was a subtle clue that this will be a story about a villain who is greater than life.Benny is a young 18-year old man working on a cruise ship.  His ship stops in Buenos Aires for repairs and Benny uses the opportunity to trace down his brother Angelo who left family long time ago and severed all relationship with them.  Angelo now goes by new name "Tetro", which later in a movie we learn is a shorten version of his last name.  Tetro is 20 years older then Benny but it is obvious that benny craves his older brother's acceptance and love.  Benny is not ready to let go of their family relationships even though Tetro assures him he "divorced" his blood family long time ago,Boys father is famous, successful conductor who is ruthless.  When Tetro announces that he wished to study philosophy instead of pre-med so he can be a writer one day, it is his father who tells him that to be a writer and live solely from writing, one must be a genius and in their family there already was one genius and it sure was not Tetro.  It is so obvious that Tetro's father is megalomaniac with sense of entitlement if for no other reason then for the fact that he is successful, rich and powerful.  Everyone else in the family is doomed to live in his shadow, Tetro is no exception.As movie goes on, the family story unfolds with all tragedies that make this film a masterpiece.  The end is explosive and it is a way for Tetro and Benny to mend the incredible losses they had to endure in their lives until that moment.  It is a story of redemption for Tetro who can finally forgive himself from walking away from the woman he loved and put aside the irreversible emotional pain caused to him by his father and other family members.This is a unique look of what type of hurt a dysfunctional person can impose on their own family.  The damage is enormous and it affects all.  This is a kind of tragedy one is used to reading only in classics.  And it is marvelous to watch.  This film will keep you engaged form start to finish.  It is one of the best films made by F.F. Coppola.

Every now and then I summon the courage to put my hands on book of poetry.  Yes, I am a snob and I like classics and poets from long ago who are no longer amongst the living.  In the recent years, I dares read poems from Eastern European writers.  When I saw this new collection of poems by Linda Gregerson, I had to acquire it and read her comprehensive collection of poems from nearly 30 years.  There are some new works and of course works that have secured Ms. Gregerson well deserved place amongst well established fine artists of American poetry.Ms. Gregerson dedicated this book to her sister which was a touching tribute.  I love this collection that is collection of contemporary work that is not shy to use various references to mythology and mythological figures.  At the same time, these poems do not shy away from the modern life and way of living with computers, internet and URLs...  This is one of the most unconventional book of poems in my collection and it gives me lots of pleasure to keep it close by and just randomly choose to re-read a poem of two daily.

Truman Capote is a literary giant.  Best known for his book "In Cold Blood" he is also an author of "Breakfast at Tiffany's".  There are numerous stories he wrote in fashion magazine.  But what is really interesting about this writer who came from humble beginnings in Alabama and had Harper Lee for the best friend when he lived there, is that he somehow found hos way into New York's high society.  He was friends with socialites such as: Barbara (Babe) Pauley, Pamela Churchill Hayward, Harriman, Slim Hayward who later married an impoverished British lord and was a template for Lauren Becall's image when she was at the height of her career.Truman had unlimited access to these ladies.  Their husbands and lovers never saw him as a threat, after all, Truman was openly homosexual.  Ladies found him entertaining and he found them to be unlimited resource of inspiration.  Babe Pauley in particular was his muse.  She was icon od elegance and high society sophistication.  Babe was beautiful and refined. Her first marriage was with Mr. Mortimer, a Standard Oil heir; but when Babe's mother found out that all his wealth was tied into trust fund he had no access to, marriage was short lived.  Soon afterwards, Babe married wealthy William Pauley, man of humble Jewish roots from Chicago, who needed to have a partners that will open the door to him to New York High Society contacts.  Babe had all he needed: contacts, beauty, refinement, taste.  Her job was to expand on his social contacts that were limited at times simply because of the fact that he was a Jew.One important thing Truman overlooked is that this class of people cherishes discretion above all.  They do not air their dirty laundry in public and when one day they find out that their lives are exposed in Truman's short story published in one of the New York magazines, he finds himself cut off without any warning from them all.  Truman committed social suicide without even realizing it at first.. He becomes a bitter man drowning in alcohol, drugs and serious of unsuitable affairs after his long term lover Jack moves on away from life he finds unacceptable to his own sensibilities.  Truman's life of excess is a road to his demise.  He suddenly finds himself lonely, unable to function, cut off from high society.  People avoid him discreetly at first and later on he is publicly cutoff for betraying people who took of him during his less fortunate times when he was just a young writer with no name and reaches.This is a lovely book about what life was like during 50s and 60s in NYC high society.  It is a story of a writer who lost his touch with reality that led to his own demise and eventually death.  A man unable to sustain his relationship with his lover Jack until he finally pushes Jack away, a man who chooses vulgar jokes as a guest on Johnny Carson's show that diminish his belonging into ladies' clique; his petty jealousy towards talented writers such as Gore Vidal, Norman Mailer and even his childhood friend Harper Lee.

I got these heavy duty gloves in order to use them on the clients who are receiving esthetics body treatments such as body scrub, body wrap, waxing and other services.  I like the fact that gloves are thicker and have texture.  For me personally, thicker glove helps establish more "distance/space" in professional relationship between service provider and a client.  More texture on the glove only can enhance the experience of the treatment.  I am not using these gloves during facial treatment.  During facial I need to "feel" the facial skin in order to determine elasticity or level or pressure during facial massage.  Also, (blackhead) extractions are easier to do with gloves that have thin consistency.These gloves come in tan color, which is another plus.  I love the fact that color is not too fancy.  It gives is professional look while on hands.

Recently I read several books on the topic of being able to establish communication channel with the loved ones who have passed onto the Other Side.  It is not uncommon for many people who go through loss to experience intense and sometimes overwhelming grief once they loose a person they love.  It is a kind of loss that is irreversible and it is usually intensified by feelings of grief, regret, abandonment to name just a few emotions.  Author Laura Lynne Jackson discovered early in her life that she has ability to sense when people are about to cross to the other side.  Later on, she realized she had a way to sense presence of the people form the other side and also establish connection with them and carry on messages they wanted to pass on to the family members that missed them.Personally I always felt I could feel subtle messages from the people I have on the Other side.  I wish that book explains on how ordinary people can create or advance the skill to connect with the souls on the other side and receive messages directly.Luckily, Ms. Jackson has degree in English language from Oxford so I can say that her book is wonderfully written.  It is really a story of a woman who came to grips about he unusual abilities early in her life.  I could understand her fear of not being understood or considered "not normal" simply for the fact of her unusual abilities that so many skeptics would dismiss right away.  But what I found really endearing is that towards the end of the book, Ms. Jackson mentions how all three of her children have unusual psychic abilities.  Each of them has different abilities and each is accepted and nurtured by their parents.This book is an easy and fun read.  I wish there is a reference in the book on how to get in touch with Ms. Jackson for people who are interested in contacting their beloved ones on the Other Side.  I decided to give this book to one of my yoga students who recently lost her sister to cancer.  I think that reading this book will give her some peace in knowing that our loved ones on the other side are always by us and that in some way, they never really left us.

I have used another product from this same brand and loved it.  So I can say that brand has consistency.  My tanning lotion came with complimentary mitt which made application very easy.  There are so many advantages about this product: it has a pleasant scent, it absorbs quickly, it does not stain and is not streaky and it lasts for almost a week.Personally I am not big on tanning, but there are times when I teach yoga workshops when I like to add a little color to my arms and chest so I do not look too pale.  Color looks natural, so no need to worry about looking "orange".This product is a good quick fix to getting some color in your skin and it is healthier than going to the tanning bad (do not go to the tanning bad if you can help it, you are begging to get cancer).

Esthetically, this watch looks very nice.  I have seen many ceramic style watches and this one matches all the others I saw to day.  The difference is that this is a digital watch and has many, many, many features.  As a matter of fact it has so many features that you really have to read the instruction manual on how to setup time, alarm, times, alarm tone, etc.That brings me to what disadvantages of the product are:#1) The instruction manual is too tiny and it is hard to read.  One almost needs magnifying glass to be able to read it.#2) The instructions and pictures are not in logical order.#3) Eventually I got so frustrated with setting up the time alone that I let it for family member to take care of because I lost all patience.#4)  Then I remembered that "fall back" time zone adjustment will happen any time soon so I gave up trying to set it up completely before I have to do it all over again in the next couple of weeks.#5) One has to keep little flimsy instruction manual hidden in a safe place, because once this manual is lost, good luck with resetting the watch.  If one has plenty of time on their hands, they can play with it for hours until all features are setup properly.And I am just too impatient to go through all of that.  I almost wish I can find a teenager to give this watch to as a present.  I am sure it would make them happy.  In the meantime, I am sticking with high end. wind it yourself, or change the battery when needed" types of watches in order to present my sanity.

Somehow I was expecting a lot more from this book then what I received at the end.  Mr. Gass has PhD in Philosophy and I expected his writing to have some deep philosophical meaning. I came across this book during my recent trip to one of the favorite store in Chicago's Greektown called "Athenian Candle" that sells candles, incense and oils to their clients.  Author Ted Andrews is well knows for his book "Animals Speak" and since I have always been curious about past lives (regression) I picked up this tiny book for the quick read on the train.Book explains basic principle of karma, past lives, reincarnation, free will.  Each chapter also explains various techniques every person can do (on their own) to facilitate subconscious knowledge about their past life regression.  Various techniques are explained: dowsing, use of pendulum, hypnosis, etc.  I like that author is explain use of incense, herbs, candles, colors, etc. to facilitate easier access tour subconscious minds.  I also like his idea that by learning about our past lives, we can more easily access information on what are the things we are supposed to work out in this lifetime so we can more easily move to the next level.  It is almost like taking an educated guess on how to live our present lives by making corrections form our past mistakes.Author passed away in 2009, but the selection of his books on the various topics on metaphysis is amazing.  Right now I am reading his book on how to read other people's aura.

I came across this 1oz perfume at my local Whole Foods store.  I love purchasing essential oils and when it comes to amber, I usually purchase essential oils with amber fragrance from Asia (India).  I was intrigues that this particular brand advertised Spanish amber.  Since I never used Spanish Amber, I wanted to compare it with the ambers of Asia.The advantage of this product is that it is only 1oz big, which means it is portable and easy to carry in purse, on the plane, etc.  Scent is warm and pleasing, but it does not last.  I have used essential oils that are 1/2 and 1/3 size of this one and fragrance would stay on my skin for an entire day.This purchase was a nice experiment, but for $25 I would rather purchase a designer perfume on sale or in a small size that this product.  It is just too expensive for the perfume that does not last very long.

I washed it in cold water and I used Woolite.  I do did not place this throw in the dryer - I let it air dry on the clothes rack.  Blanket was soft, it had beautiful Woolite fragrance and as I said made both my kitty Jake and me very happy.  Now we cuddle under it when I read books or watch movies.

This is beautiful bottle to use when exercising or while at the gym.  It looks, nice, color is translucent blue and mechanism for keeping water fresh and uncontaminated is superior from any other bottles I have been using in the past.  I use this bottle with clean, spring water and I love to add lemon or lime to it for some extra flavor and vitamins.You can wash this bottle in the dishwasher, it is perfectly safe.

A friend of mine just purchased sail boat.  She has it on beautiful lake Michigan and she is a really good sailor.  Of course, her boat was not brand new, so it required some cleaning up.  As we know woman's work is never done, so in addition to planning itineraries for weekend sailing plans and doing the actual sailing, she is also cleaning up the boat.  Anyway, the "sail house" as I call it is spic and span clean and shiny and this helpful cleaning wax will be used once sailing season in Midwest is over and boat is ready for storage over the winter months.So if you have a sail boat, this is a good wax to use.  And if you do not have a sail boat, it makes a good "thank you" gift for your friend that takes you out for a weekend sailing trip.  It also makes a practical sail-warming present (get it --"housewarming/sailwarming"..)

I actually like this chips very much.  If you expect to eat chips that feels and tastes like a potato chips, I must tell you right away that you will be disappointed.  If for no other reason then for the fact that this chips does taste like beans. So if you like beans you are good to go.  Ingredients are all healthy: black beans, stone ground corn, canola oil, sunflower oil, safflower oil, brown rice flour, flax seed, sunflower and sesame seeds, quinoa and sea salt.

I am yoga practitioner and yoga teacher.  Recently I came across this book at my yoga studio.  I decided to read it, since I noticed that author mentions how practicing yoga helped him cure his colitis and ADD.  I really enjoyed book from the start.  Author has sense of humor and he is not afraid to make fun of himself and sometime incredulous situations he found himself in.  He explains how he got hooked on yoga during his college years and how eventually teaching yoga and providing holistic healing became his calling in spite of the fact that he earned business degree from Georgetown University.  I happen to know another overeducated yogi, Ms. Amy Beth Treciokas who is my yoga teacher who studies Ashtanga Yoga under Pathabi Jois.  Ms. Treciokas has degree from University of Chicago and instead of pursuing career in medicine, she choose to open her yoga studio in Chicago's Gold Coast - called Yoga Now.In that respect, I understand how some people, like Brian Leaf, simply find happiness, fulfillment and joy in being of service to others, while using yoga to help them maintain healthy and happy personal and professional life.This book is a light read, but very funny.  It gives an insight to why some people choose to live life that does not always has guarantee to comfort and financial stability and yet, they feel full of life and energy to wake up in the morning every day and carry on with their lives. It takes years and decades to come to terms with such life and it is not always easy.  Every yoga teacher knows that it is not always possible making a living by teaching yoga.  But most people I know use yoga as a way to add value to their life.  Without it, even in their corporate jobs and family life, they are unable to find a full peace.  The fulfillment comes form practice, medication and willingness to carve out a little time for oneself during the day and just focus to one's inner Divine Power.

I really like this wall clock.  It is much larger than I expected, but I like it very much.  I intend to use it in my yoga studio.  But this clock is perfect for use at home too, especially in the kitchen or in the exercise room if you have one.  Numbers on the clock are quite large but it is nice that clock is silent.  hence the use in the yoga studio.  It will not disturb the class with the noise, especially during meditation and shavasana (final relaxation) pose.

These are beautiful body pads that one can use on both face and body.  It is perfect for oily and combination oily skin (on the face) because pads are soaked with salicylic acid that prevents acne and helps control oil production.  I must say that this product is useful for both men and women.  I do have another secret on how to use this product on the body.  It is perfect after bikini / brazilian waxing (shaving).  After waxing, it helps going over the skin with this pad because it will help prevent creation of the ingrown hairs.  I know some friends who have been using Image cleansing pads that are soaked with the same ingredients as these.  This product is much more affordable and it gives the same results.Someone was asking what is the percentage of salicylic acid in the product.  It is 2% in case you are curious.

I really like the color of this bra.  It is almost golden color.  Straps are removable so one can wear the bra with summer strapless dresses or blouses.  Bra has satin like feel and look and it provides great coverage.  Personally I do not like bras with underwire and this one has one.  This size is a little too big for me and I am not sure I will be wearing it.  For personal reasons I prefer wire-free undergarments because they feel more comfortable on my skin and body.  Overall tis is beautiful product and it is good to know that Maidenform still make high quality products for women.

This is lovely work of fiction describing the unusual relationship between famous painter Camille Pissaro's parents.  Camille's mother Rachel Pomie Petit Pizzaro was born and raised on a small island of St. Thomas to Jewish parents.  She was devoted to her father Moses and had turbulent relationship with her mother.  Rachel was a free spirit and she felt confined in her role of a woman.  Encouraged by her father to read, she often imagined herself to live in Paris, France.  Being of Jewish faith, and obedient to her father's wishes, at very early age Rachel was married to her father's business partner Isaac Petit, who was a widower, almost 20 years older than Rachel and who already had 8 children with his first wife, three of whom survived and became Rachel's responsibility to take care of once they were married.  Their marriage was a business arrangement that was supposed to improve failings of two businesses and make a single strong business venture.As fate will have it, Rachel' s beloved housekeeper she was very close to died and not long after Rachel was married; Rachel's father passed away soon after and before Rachel turned 30, she had 3 children with her husband and the fourth one on the way when her husband suddenly died at the age of 50 leaving behind Rachel alone with 7 children and a failing business.  As it turns out, her husband was inept businessman and his family who lived in France, decided to send over Isaac's nephew Abraham Gabriel Francois Pizzaro to help Rachel in reviving the business.  So the real story starts here; Rachel is a widow with 7 children and 8 years senior to Francois.  According to Jewish tradition, she and Francois are related through marriage and the intimate relationship between the two is forbidden.  In spite of it all, the two fall in love madly with each other and end up having 4 children together, one of them  (the third one) was Abraham Jacobo Camille Pizzaro who grew up to become one of the best known painters in the age of French Impressionism..  Camille had difficult relationship with his mother, perhaps because the two were very much alike.  Both rebellious, emotional, craving for love and beauty of life.  Camille is not interested in pursuing family tradition of being a shopkeeper and his lack of interest in school forces his parents to send him to Paris at the age of 12 where he stays until he is 17 years old.  It is in Paris that Camille develops his talent for drawing and painting that sets him on the path to become one of the founders of the French Impressionist movement.Camille comes back to St. Thomas, but before long leaves island again to live and create art in Venezuela; He eventually moves to Paris.  While his relationship with his father is tender, Camille and his mother are at odds.  He is her favorite son and yet she is unable to talk him out of living his life as an artist.  Throughout his life, his mother supports Camille and his family financially and he never manages to completely break away form her and her demands.  As much as Rachel carved her own path in her own life despite other people objections, she was unable to do the same for her favorite son.  In her desire to ensure only the best for him, she is opinionated and sharp tongued that puts the two o them against each other for the rest of their lives.Ms. Hoffman is a prolific writer who received many literary recognitions over the years.  This book is beautifully written and all characters were compelling although most of them are fictional (with exception f Camille's immediate family members and her mother's personal history).  For anyone who loves art, impressionism and wants to learn more about what mind of a true artist is probably like, this is delightful book to read.  I love the fact that both Camille and his mother Rachel shared one thing in common: they believed in power of love.  Neither one of them was wiling to give up their true love of life because of other people's opinions.  It was not an easy thing to stand up to establishment, tradition, social rules of the time and of course family.  But they both did.  They each gave it all to the persons who they loved deeply and neither one of them had regrets.  Not that is what I call true love.

I teach and practice yoga.  So almost daily I walk barefoot in the yoga studio.  I do have regular bi-weekly pedicures and I can say I am fortunate enough that my feet look decent.  However, I walk a lot.  I commute to and from work by train and sometimes I get blisters or skin hardens.  I use foot creams and lotions every night, but I also like to scrub my feet vigorously for the purposes of exfoliation and better blood circulation.  I used pumice stone in a shower in the past until one day, at TJ Maxx I came across this buffer/brush that has 4 different sides to it for every possible treatment of feet one can possibly need.  My brush is just like the one in the picture - pink.  Regardless of what some of the other reviewers have to say about the color, I must say that color was the last reason I bought this tool.  I use it on my feet and I can see the results.  It rubs and it polishes and it can also help cleansing the nails.  There is a warning on the product that people with diabetes and poor blood circulation or inflamed skin should not be using this tool.Not so long ago I also purchased cuticle nipper made by Clean logic which incidentally also came in pink color. Nipper replaced the previous one I had that was no longer sharp or effective.  There is one important thing to mention about CleanLogic line of products.  Isaac Shapiro, founder of the company created a brand of beauty products that also uses Braille alphabet on its packaging.  It is fantastic to learn that there is a company that creates products for beauty and health that also helps blind people or people with severe vision loss to live fulfilling and independent lives.  When you purchase any of the CleanLogic products, portion of the sale goes towards the Inspiration Foundation, non profit organization created in honor of Mr. Shapiro's mother that supports vision impaired individuals.

I came across this book while shopping for candles and incense at the small shop in Chicago's Greektown.  For very long time, I had a feeling that my vital energy is being drained.  Every time I replenish it, it would deplete just as fast.  When I saw the book in the store, I decided to pick it up.  If there were people r forces who were causing me to suffer, perhaps this book could help me eliminate their presence or influence in my life.  I must say, the book turned out to be a real revelation.  It is a tiny little book, only 88 pages long, but I kept reading and re-reading every chapter.  After every chapter there is a part of the book where one can make notes.  I have learned about evil eye, psychic attacks and other maladies that people of low character or with malicious thoughts can project.  But thanks to the author, I also found out the best ways to protect myself from such influences.  I learned about healing properties of essential oils, herbs, healing baths, spiritual cleansing techniques that include use of incense and specially prepared baths.  I also learned how to cleanse my home from negative energies.  For anyone who believes that there is another plane of existence besides our physical realm, this is a must have book and manual they must have.  I am using this book as a reference manual and it is becoming my way of life.  It is a way that keeps me spiritually strong, mentally alert and aware.  I wish I knew about this book and the author sooner.

I used to have one of these in green color, because my iPhone is green.  And then I lost it.  I was so excited when I noticed that this product comes in lilac-purple color.  It complements green phone beautifully and it still has girlie feel to it.  I now keep this cord at work so I can change on iPhone on PCs USB port.

I love the look and feel of this weekly planner. Of course the most unusual part of it is that it is July1015-July 2016 calendar which makes it somewhat untraditional.  Colors are very pleasing.  Cover is tannish/gray with orange spiral bound.  These colors complement each other very well and make this planner an elegant look.I teach yoga and I am taking advanced yoga teacher training.  This planner allows me to stay on op of my daily activities related to everything yoga.  Weekly layout is just what I need.  I do not need more or less space than it is provided, because my days with yoga events are not booked solid.  There are only a couple of events during the day, and yet I like to be reminded of them - an old fashioned way.  I do not like electronic calendars.  Also in my classes mobile phones are turned off, so it is convenient to have a real planner available to remind me of my responsibilities.  Planner is also lightweight so it does not take lots of space or weight, which is a plus especially for women who tend to carry too much stuff in their purses and carry on bags.  I really like this product.  I am not sure what retail stores offer it, but it is nice to know that one can find it on Amazon.

I purchased this product because it is medical grade toner for oily and acne prone skin.  It has only 2% salycilic acid, but it feels much stronger.  I use this toner in the morning and at night after cleansing the skin.  It definitely controls oil production and keep skin blemish free.  I used to be devoted to Obagi products, but ever since I finished my esthetics licensure, I am finding myself drawn to try other medical grade products.  One of the biggest competitors in medical grade products with this line is Neocutis and IS Clinical.  I Love Neocutis skin care and IS sunscreen products.  Obagi has unfortunate fallen down the list.  Still good products, but when it comes to the price, I am convinced that there are others that are price competitive and superior in quality.  I will still buy Obagi if I find a good deal, but unfortunately it is no longer my first choice.  I would still recommend products from this line to anyone.

Ms. Polly Samson, author of the book is well known author in her native England.  She is a recipient of many prizes for her work.  This is her first book published in US and I will be the first to admit that the reason I picked up the book is because of its title.  It is a story about love between Julia and Julian.  Julian is a young man, student of literature when one day he meets Julia who is training her hawk in the fields  and falls madly in love with her.  Julia is eight years his senior, without any education (except for her high school) and she has been married for almost 12 years to a man who is as abusive as he is a looser.  Her husband met her when he was young, runaway from not so happy family.  Julia's father was an alcoholic and her mother is controlling and outright mean, opinionated and crude.  Julian is raised as an only son of a widow from nice to do middle class.  His mother was generously taken care of by her intimate friend who marries her once Julian is away form college.Love between Julia and Julian is overpowering for them both.  Of course, there are always others looking to destroy such enviable devotion of two people towards each other.  Both Julian and Julia make sacrifices.  She divorces her abusive husband and Julian gives up his promising career graduate school and in academia and so he can raise family with Julia.  After many long years of trying, they manage to have a girl Mira Eliana than deepens their connection even more.  But when Mira gets sick, their love is put to test and  their 7 year old relationship spirals destruction that cannot be undone.I had a little bit of difficulty reading the book because it jumps (unexpectedly) from past to present.  But the story had me hooked from start to finish.  I just did not expect the story to have such explosive ending.  Unexpected twists and turns and unhappy ending to all participants involved.

Ahava product lines have been around a while.  Sometimes I forget that although they are widely accessible (one can find it in any retail store: from grocery stores to CVS & Walgreens) that are still a high quality products.  What makes this product unique is that if you look at the ingredients list, this product is not made out of any water, the main ingredient of the product is dead see water and other waters from nature (all from Israel).  There is also some witch hazel in this product (good antiseptic) and allantoin (moisturizer).  What really took my breath away is how beautiful fresh scent this product has.  It is very thick in texture, so you will not need to use too much on it on your hands.  Product absorbs well on the skin and stays on for a long time.  I have been using this product on my hands, but I also apply it at night on my feet before going to bed.  Extra moisture is really keeping my heels soft s and nice looking for the summer season when I wear sandals.  I highly recommend this product: it is easy to find in the store, it has good quality and it is very reasonably priced.

This set of curtains come in a nice plastic container, so no need to worry that lace will damage in transport.  lace is decorated with flowers that gives it nice European feel.  But do not be fooled, for this product is made in China.  I do not like that curtains are made of 100% polyester.  They feel rough to the touch.  Color is off white and material washes well in the washing machine (I always wash new textile products and clothing when I first buy them before I put them to use).I would probably use these curtains in the rooms with least traffic: pantry, basement, etc.  It will cover the window and provide privacy.  But I am not crazy about the design and material so this type of curtain will never end up in my dining room or a family room.  Dpo not mean to be a snob, but it is just too tacky.

This is lovely set of 100% cotton towels.  Set includes 4 towels, all of the same design.  The picture of the chef is perfect if you are going to give this as a present to the male member of the family of a friend who likes to cook.  I find it to be delightful present for Fathers Day and even men who like to BBQ during sunny summer days.  Cotton is not too soft, which makes it comfortable to use in kitchen.  It is durable and easy to wash.  And if you do not use it, it makes very nice kitchen decoration.  Colors are very vibrant and design will agree with any kitchen.

I have been Natori customer for a while, although I must admit that all of my purchases for this brand were limited to their intimates products.  Their clothing line is fine quality and I was intrigued to try their body lotion.  I must say that lotion comes in elegantly designed bottle and it is easy to use (no extra squeezing of the bottle needed, also lotion is the right texture too - not too watery or too reach).  However, I find scent to bee too flowery and sweet.  It is OK for young women, but more mature customers may find it a little too girlish.  I use it only on the weekends when it is time to go to bed or after I take shower after my workout and do not plan to go out in public.  So in a way this lotion has become my house-bound body moisturizing solution -- until is all used up.  And after that, I do not think I will be using it again.

I used to get Frommers' travel guides before all of my trips and read and research places and things I could see.  One day, I got work assignment in Hong Kong, China and in my local library I found lovely books on China from Lonely Planet.  From that point on, Lonely Planet travel books are always my first choice for getting ready for my trips - domestic or international.  Recently, I picked up the book on France that covers the most exciting parts of the country any visitor with plenty of time should visit and enjoy at the slow pace.  Surely, I could not miss the latest edition of travel book on Paris - the City of Love.  There is absolutely everything great about this book:  it provides just right amount of information so the book is not too thin or too thick to carry on your trip.  It is well written and photos are so beautiful.  I normally do not care about taking pictures when I am on vacation.  I love to experience the trip, people, food, my travel companion(s) and taking pictures I find to be a distraction.  So even if you do take pictures, there are some in this book that are so beautiful you will not want to get rid of the book.  Looking at the pictures will bring all the memories from the trip.With this book one can visit all the amazing places in Paris without having to join hordes of people that are part of the tourist groups.  You will be on your own and you will love it.  Even better, all information about the museums, city, restaurants are authentic so there will be no need to rely on someone else's opinion about things and places.  You will be free to draw your own conclusions and even more amazing, you will find it you agree with the travel writer of this wonderful guide most of the time.  Happy travels!

The reason I picked this book is because I was curious to read a book on how an underdog gets to find a job and success on Wall Street.  So many times in professional careers we find out it is not what we know but who we know that propels one's career.  Mr. DeSenna Trennet is gracious to acknowledge in his book all the people who helped him along the way with his career.  His grandfather was Italian immigrant and parents lived modest lives in Long Island.  Once he realized that he does not have what it takes (money and connections) to land a career in diplomacy, he applies his abilities working in financial markets on Wall Street.There are moments that I found book very amuzing.  For example, Mr. DeSenna's observation that ivy league schools are nothing better that expensive job recruiting places (he got his undergraduate degree at Georgetown).  It is also funny when his colleagues on 10th anniversary from their business school start sending snotty updates about how "successful" they are.  His reply to them all probably did not win him any new friends, but the gist of it is so amuzing it is worth referencing it during social events and gatherings with friends.However, there are parts of the book the I found somewhat biased and disturbing.  For example, he references people who gave him job opportunities in the past only by their names and he references Donald Trump as "Mr. Trump".  Personally, I do not find Donald Trump to be any more remarkable than many of the people he mentions in the book.  The only thing Donald Trump has going for him is his celebrity status, which almost puts his in the same category as Kardashians. Mr. DeSenna also references some of the pitfalls of the industry - beautiful women.  Most of them use their appeal to gather insider information.  Some have even landed in jail for doing so.  But his "friend and colleague" Maria Bartiromo is excluded from the pack even though (as far as I remember) she was accused of getting too cozy with one of the CEOs from the major financial corporation.  I guess Ms. "Money Honey" is staying away from marketing her sex appeal (not!).Towards the end of the book I found many of his comments disturbing starting with comparison of how unfair Social Security is.  He mentions a woman who supposedly contributed only $27 in her lifetime to Social Security fund, got to live to be 100 and over the years she collected $27,000 in Social Security. For someone who is so proud of his Italian heritage and European roots, it is surprising that he finds no need to show at least some respect towards elderly poor who have no other means to make money, but depend on society to help them out.  I was so shocked with his comments that I almost felt grateful there is no legal euthanasia allowed in the state of NY.  This guy would probably put this woman to death in order to  save money in social security fund.  I guess no human being contributes to society at all to be taken care of in some form or another once they get old and especially if (God forbid) they end up having no family since they got to live to be 100.The other thing that was disturbing is his proposal to charge immigrants $50,000-$100,000 for the privilege to become US citizens.  I just want to know how is he planning to collect that money from some  uneducated fruit picker from Mexico who makes less than a minimum wage and has family to support with that money.And lastly, there is his disregard for nature and sacredness of earth.  His proposal to solve national debt is to have places like Grand Canyon sold to corporations like (Disney or Great America) that could generate revenue by creating amuzement park?!  Come on, Mr. DeSenna what is next - let's chip the stone from Grand Canyon and start selling it to masses so they can build fabulous kitchen counters in their precious homes!!!The book started great and it ended poorly.  It is still a read one should take on because there are so many things one can challenge in this book coming from an Ivy League educated financial wizard I do not even know where to begin from...

I have been feeding my kitty this food for the last couple of weeks.  Normally I give him Science Diet and this brand was a little bit of diversion.  I decided to see if he has special affection for the cat food that is gluten free.  Description of this food states that it is good for cat's immune and digestive system and it also helps support kitty's skin and coat.  In addition to chicken, this cat food is loaded with antioxidants.  Here is a short list of ingredients:Chicken, Chicken Meal, Chickpeas, Peas, Lentils, Chicken Liver, Chicken Hearts, Flaxseed, Pea Fiber, Tapioca Flour, Tomato Pomace, Chicken Fat (preserved with Mixed Tocopherols), Natural Flavor, Beets, Coconut Oil, Cranberries, Choline Chloride, Turmeric, Calcium Carbonate, Chia Seeds, Vitamin E Supplement, Taurine, Zinc Proteinate, Spinach, Mixed Tocopherols added to preserve freshness, Broccoli, Ginger, Pumpkin, Parsley, Apples, Blueberries, Kale, Purple Carrots, Niacin, Iron Proteinate, Copper Proteinate, Thiamine Mononitrate, Vitamin A Supplement, Biotin, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Riboflavin, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Manganese Proteinate, Yucca Schidigera Extract, Inulin, Calcium Iodate, Sodium Selenite, Folic Acid, Dried Lactobacillus plantarum Fermentation Product, Dried Enterococcus faecium Fermentation Product, Dried Lactobacillus casei Fermentation Product, Dried Lactobacillus acidophilus Fermentation Product, Dried Enterococcus thermophilus Fermentation Product, Dried Lactobacillus bulgaricus Fermentation Product, Rosemary Extract, Green Tea Extract, Spearmint Extract (this is a naturally preserved product).It just seems that my kitty cat's selection of acceptable food just got bigger!

OK - accidents happen.  I exercise often and that adds significant load for wash every week.  One time, I forgot to take out wet clothes from the washer and hand dry 9it (which I do with my exercise clothes).  Try not to do that to yourself, because you will discover that clothes do not smell good if left in the washer overnight. After all - what is the point of washing exercise clothes if afterwards they are still not going to smell fresh?  So to rescue my really nice (and pricey) yoga gear, I washed clothes again and added this deodorant for clothes.  I love the scent and I can say that after the wash unpleasant stale scent disappears and thankfully I got my clothes back.I am hoping not to have similar "accidents" in the future and if I do, this is a go to rescue solution.  On a good days I plan to use this product on bedding sheets so they will always smell fresh when bed is made.  There is nothing better then going to bed and inhaling sublime scent.

I tried this product because it is marketed as "water sleeping mask" and it contains trademarked "Sleepscent" that is good for all skin types.  This product is actually made in Korea.  It is a gel mask that contains essential oils of orange flower, rose and sandalwood.  These three oils are what makes "sleepscent" and their gentle scent helps getting to sleep.  However, for anyone familiar with aromatherapy it is worth mentioning that sandalwood is not always the best choice for the essential oil for anyone who is suffering from depression.  Product contains apricot extract - which I love because it is deeply hydrating and it also has chesnut extract that helps skin retexturizing.So the water part of the label comes from the fact that this is a gel mask and not heavy; ingredients are very hydrating.  But I could not understand why this is called mask.  My routine typically includes, cleansing skin and applying toner.  At night I apply serum that also has high concentration of vitamin C (antioxidant).  The last step is to apply this gel mask.  Upon applying it on the skin it gives nice cooling effect to the skin: sensitive skin, will love relief, and oily/combination skin will like the fact that mask is not heavy and cooling effect tightens the pores.  Additionally, mask is absorbed very quickly and does not leave any residue.  The only difference that makes this mask and not a night cream is the fact that it is recommended for use 1-2 times a week.  But in my opinion this is a nice hydrating gel that can be applied overnight, not a mask.But the results are good and product is not too expensive.  Other than preservatives (which are chemicals and part of most skin care products), this product for the most part contains healthy ingredients.

To me personally good mattress is a must in any bedroom.  Recently I purchased mattress topper that added even more comfort to my bed.  As you can imagine, my first concern was how to protect the new topper and ensure its longevity.  I also have a pet, kitty cat Jake, so I thought that this zippered mattress protector can preserve integrity of the mattress from cat hair and dandruff - even thought I am not allergic to it.  My mattress encasement came in queen size (60" x 80") and it is white color.  Cover of the package that it came in states that encasement servers mattress and bedbug barrier, allergen protection and waterproof protection and it helps with bedbugs (they cannot bite through the fabric), prevents staining and contamination of the mattress from liquids, prevents dust mites from accumulating in the mattress, protects from pollen and pet dander.Once I opened the package, I really did not like the feel of the encasement.  This encasement is made of 100% polyester and film that is 100% polyethylene.  So basically, it is almost as if you are placing plastic over your mattress.  In my opinion, plastic will choke any lady bugs, but then again, how is mattress fabric going to "breathe"?In short, this encasement will help the cleanliness of the mattress.  It will be difficult to put on considering how heavy mattresses can be, so I do not see it being washed on a weekly basis.  It is perfect solution to use in places like nursing homes, senior citizen housing centers and hospitals. I just do not see it being used in my household.

Some time ago I read Ms. Tiffany Reisz's book from her Original Sinners series.  From the White Years series I read "The King" and "Virgin" is the second book I read.  For readers familiar with both series, it will be helpful to let them know that main characters Soren, Eleanor, Kingsley and Juliette continue to share their (alternative) lifestyle together. This book is dedicated to recalling the events form the year when Eleanor left Soren.  It also introduces a new character Kyrie, young girl barely 20 years old who chooses to become a nun.I am already familiar with the characters of the novel and their traits.  But as someone who has already read about them, it was easy for me to make a quick switch between Nora, Eleanor and Elle, Ms. Schreiber or Mrs. Sutherland.  They are really all the same person, but for any reader who has not read any of the previous work by Ms. Reisz, that may be too confusing. That is the reason I gave book 4 starts.I did like the fact that this book finally tackles the mystery of what happened between Soren and Eleanor to make her leave him.  All readers knew about the event from the previous book is that it was the hardest year for everyone who was a part of the tale about these characters.  The secret and mystery is finally out and some twists and turns on what happened and how it happened make readers stick with the story form start to finish.  Compared to some of her earlier books, some of the (erotic) scenes from the book are not as strong as they were in her first books.  Or it could be that I find nothing shocking in actions that characters make in and out of their bedrooms.

Silicone rings are my answer to a problem that I've had for years, my traditional metal wedding band would constantly get scratched from the daily grind of my job and trips to the gym. I have a few different silicone rings and but I really like this one, its simple but classic. The red stripe gives you some style and looks particularly good with sportier attire. I would like to point out the color is dark gray and not black. I didn't read the description and was a bit surprised. I know a few Buckeye fans who would go crazy for one of these. This ring protects my precious metal ring from getting damaged at work and the gym. The silicon stretches a little bit so the ring is extremely comfortable and feels a lot safer. I'm very happy with my new nursing cover. The neck strap is nice and wide too so its super comfortable even if your child insist on pulling on it while nursing. Its a warm / muted dusty rose that look sophisticated enough to look like a mommy item and not a pinky, pinky baby girl item, like I said I use mine with my son. Overall its a wonderful product that I'll be recommending to all my mommy friends. I actually already bought more to give as gifts. I also really liked the included 4 pack of nursing pads. We had a good laugh about this novel little product but then we actually had to try it and see if it worked. The spray actually has a bit of a body spray scent when you spray it and according to the instructions you just spray it before you do your business and it creates a barrier over the water that prevents smells from rising up after your done. I tried it and the only detectable scent in the room was the spray smell, which is pretty pleasant. My grandmother says she uses this all the time and plans to buy more if it ever runs out. We got a free bottle in exchange for sharing our honest review.

I have been the victim of credit card skimming once before and it was no picnic. The frustrating and long drawn out experience with my credit card company was made worse by the fact that I easily could have prevented the ordeal by using an RFID product like this earlier. Following that incident I prefer to keep my cards in an RFID protected sleeve. I started using them recently but I just love them. I get the piece of mind that my cards information is safe. You get 10 mini sleeves in this set that fit your standard credit card and 2 passport sleeves. I only needed 4 card sized ones so I plan to give some of these to relatives since I got so many and they are just awesome. I received a complimentary pack in exchange for my honest review during a promotion.

I'm always looking to try new sleep aids. I can be a total insomniac from time to time with difficulty falling asleep and staying asleep. I try to shy away from strong / addictive prescription sleep aids so when I came across an opportunity to try out Sleep Support in exchange for my honest review I figured I had nothing to loose. The pills are easy to take and I start to feel sleepy within about 30 minutes of taking the recommended dose. I've been able to lye down and my busy mind is actually ready to power down and get some sleep vs my usual running though the day thinking about tomorrow racing thoughts that usually plague me.  This sleep aid seems strong enough to really work but I don't feel drowsy until I really go lie down, it feels a lot safer than a prescription sleep aid I once tried that made me feel like I was just tranquilized. Overall I am very happy with this product and would recommend it to others struggling to fall asleep and stay asleep.

I've made a few purchases of these Baltic amber necklaces because their products are very high quality and these make great gifts for new moms. This necklace is just beautiful in person. I've seen a few different varieties of these baby amber necklaces and this is particularly attractive. The beads have a pretty warm glow in the light and I was very impressed with the apparent quality. I put this necklace on my son it feels very sturdy and the clasp screws in so you don't have to worry about it breaking apart or pinching your child. Each amber bead is separated by a knot so even if the necklace did somehow pull apart the tiny beads would not all become instant choking bait. I also really like that this amber necklace is guaranteed to be authentic and comes with a nice carry bag. My son had been a chronic drooler and was suffering from some pretty bad teething pains, but he seems to have really let up on that since he has been wearing the necklace. Weather you believe these help teething or not, I think the cost is small to ensure you've taken every possible step to make your child more comfortable during a tough time. I definitely would give this brand my business if you do decide to get one because the quality of this necklace is some of the best I've seen. This dark amber color necklace in particular is just so pretty. I received a discounted product in exchange for my honest review.

I can be a total insomniac from time to time with difficulty falling asleep and staying asleep. I try to shy away from strong / addictive prescription sleep aids so when I came across an opportunity to try out Somsa in exchange for my honest review I was really excited. The pills are easy to take and I start to feel sleepy within about 30 minutes of taking the recommended dose. I've been able to lye down and my busy mind is actually ready to power down and get some sleep vs my usual running though the day thinking about tomorrow racing thoughts that usually plague me. I've also been sleeping though a full 8 hour night, finally. This sleep aid seems strong enough to really work but I don't feel drowsy until I really go lie down, it feels a lot safer than a prescription sleep aid I once tried that made me feel like I was just tranquilized. Overall I am very happy with this product and would recommend it to others struggling to fall asleep and stay asleep.

I had heard B vitamins were one of the main ingredients in several big name energy drinks and that many people take the B vitamins alone to get the energy minus the jitters from energy drinks. I came across a promotional offer to try these Zenwise b-12 vitamins at a discount in exchange for my honest review and figured I had nothing to loose. I do feel like I get a nice boost from these and I don't experience jitters or headaches like I do when I drink coffee or Red Bulls. The pills are small and easy on my stomach so I've been really happy with them and I like to take them in the morning before heading to work.

I hate wearing my nice metal wedding ring to the gym. It gets scratched and dirty and in the way while I workout. I have seen a few people sporting these rubber wedding bands and thought they looked like the perfect thing to ward off creepy gym rats without having to subject my nice ring to the abuse of the gym. The ring is actually really cute and I like the color selection this brand offers. I received a discounted ring during a promotion in exchange for my honest review.

I got spray during a promotion to try it out for free in exchange for my honest review. I have a little dog that loves to lick my micro sued couch and it gets funny and is often wet when I go to sit down from this funny little habit. I spoke with my vet and they recommended getting her more toys and exercise to ensure its not just boredom so we have which is helping but I think the licking is just a habit now so we really wanted to try this and see if it would stop. We spritzed a layer over the sofa and she hasn't licked it in the 3 days since, which is rare, so I think its working. I'll be updating if and when I needed to respray it.

I've been struggling to get rid of the stretch marks on my thighs and breast after the birth of my son. I tried bio oil but it was honestly just stinky and too messy so I stopped. I came across a promotional offer to try a discounted jar of this Body Merry Scar and Stretch Mark cream in exchange for my honest review and figured I had nothing to loose. I actually really like it. The scent is pretty like a lotion whereas Bio Oil smelt like musty perfume to me. The cream absorbs easily, it wasn't runny and I don't feel greasy afterward. Its been a little over a week and my stretch marks are already looking noticeably lighter.

1:11 MinsI've had a few different can openers over the years but I had never tried one of these safe edge cutters. They look they wouldn't even be able to open a can upon first inspection but if you follow the directions and give it a try its quite easy.
